GK16andhvc2u:6: avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaner vācyaṃ dvidhā matam // DhvK_2.1 //
GK16andhvc2u:10: locanam dvitīya uddyotaḥ yā smaryamāṇā śreyāṃsi sūte dhvaṃsayate rujaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:19: tatra dviprakāraprakāśane vṛttikārakṛte yannimittaṃ bījabhūtamiti bālapriyā dvitīya uddyotaḥ locanasyottarasyāto na vyākhyā prapyate 'tra tat /
GK16andhvc2u:28: yadvā-abhīṣṭāni phalāni yasyāṃ sā udārā mahatī ca kalpavallī tāmiti rūpakam /
GK16andhvc2u:57: tatra prathamoddyote vṛttikāreṇa prakāśitaḥ avivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo 'vāntaraprakārastatpratipādanāyedamucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:58: tadavāntarabhedapratipādanadvāreṇaiva cānuvādadvāreṇāvivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo vivakṣitānyaparavācyātprabhinnatvaṃ tatpratipādanāyedamucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:61: saṅkramitamiti ṇicā vyañcanāvyāpāre yaḥ sahakārivargastasyāyaṃ prabhāva ityuktaṃ tiraskṛtaśabdena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:62: yena vācyenāvivakṣitena satāvivakṣitāvācyo dhvanirvyapadiśyate tadvācyaṃ dvidheti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:63: yo 'rthaṃ upapadyamano 'pi tāvataivānupayogāddharmāntarasaṃvalanayānyatāmiva gato lakṣyamāṇo 'nugatadharmī sūtranyāyenāste sa rūpāntarapariṇata uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:64: bālapriyā “iti pratamodyota” ityuktatvādatra pakṣe tatreti tatpadena tasya parāmarśa ityāhṛ--
GK16andhvc2u:68: atra pakṣe ata iti śeṣo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:110: dharmāntarasaṃvalanayā vācyadharmātiriktadharmaprakārakapratītiviṣayatvena hetunā anyatāṃ gata iva lakṣyamāṇaḥ pratīyamānaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:111: anugatadharmī san lakṣyamāṇadharmāṇāṃ tatra tatra bhinnatve 'pi vyaktirūpo dharmī anustūta eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:116: snigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladbalākā dhanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:117: locanam yastvanupapadyamāna upāyatāmātreṇārthāntarapratipattiṃ kṛtāv palāyata iva sa tiraskṛta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:118: nanu vyaṅgyātmano yadā dhvanerbhedo nirūpyate tadā vācyasāya dvidheti bhedakathanaṃ na saṅgatamityāśaṅkyāha--
GK16andhvc2u:122: vyañjake tvarthe yadi dhvaniśabdastadā na kaściddoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:126_0: snigdhayā jalasambandhasarasayā śyāmalayā draviḍavanitocitāsitavarṇayā kāntyā cākacakyena
GK16andhvc2u:126_1: liptamācchuritaṃ viyannabho yaiḥ vellantyo vijṛmbhamāṇāstatā calantyaḥ parabhāgavaśātpraharṣavaśācca
GK16andhvc2u:126_2: balākāḥ bālapriyā rūpāntarapariṇata iti arthāntare saṅkramitamityasyaiva vivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:142: viśeṣa ityasyānantaraṃ 'iti vyaṅgyaprakāśanaparasya dhvanerevāyaṃ prakāraḥ' iti pāṭhaḥ kvācitkaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:147: tatrādyapakṣe avivakṣitavācyasyetyasya avivakṣitaḥ apradhānīkṛto vācyassvātmā yena sa iti prathamodyotoktārthau bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:166: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarve sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava //
GK16andhvc2u:167: locanam sitapakṣiviśeṣā yeṣu ta evaṃ nabhastāvaddurālokaṃ vartate /
GK16andhvc2u:169: yataḥ sūkṣmajalakaṇodgāriṇo vātā iti mandamandatvameṣāmaniyatadigāgamanaṃ ca bahuvacanena sūcitam /
GK16andhvc2u:171: payodānāṃ ye suhṛdasteṣu ca satsu ye śobhanahṛdayā mayūrāsteṣāmānandena harṣeṇa kalāḥ ṣaṅjasaṃvādinyo madhurāḥ kekāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ tāśca sarvaṃ payodavṛttāntaṃ dussahaṃ smārayanti;
GK16andhvc2u:173: evamuddīpanavibhāvodbodhitavipralambhaḥ parasparādhiṣṭānatvadrateḥ vibhāvānāṃ sādhāraṇatāmabhimanyamānaḥ ita eva prabhṛti priyatamāṃ hṛdayenidhāyaiva svātmavṛttāntaṃ tāvadāha--
GK16andhvc2u:181: sa bālapriyā śīkarima iti śīkarasambandhapratipādanena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:189: śobhanahṛdayā iti ata evānanda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:217: tathāca kaṭhorahṛdayapadantadarthānuguṇānāmeva dharmāṇāṃ rāmaśabdena vyañjene sahaṅkāritayā nirdiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:226: uktaprakāreṇa hṛdayanihitāṃ priyāṃ smaraṇaśabdavikalpaparamparayā pratyakṣībhāvitāṃ hṛdayasphoṭanonmukhīṃ sasaṃbhramamāha--
GK16andhvc2u:236: pratīyamānaṃ tu tadasaṅkhyamanudbhi viseṣatvenaiva kiṃ kiṃ rūpaṃ na sahata iti citrapānakarasāpūpaguḍamodakasthānīyavicitracarvaṇāpadaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:275: anudbhinnaḥ aspaṣṭaḥviśeṣaḥ pārthakyaṃ parasparabheda iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:278: kintu parasparasaṃvalitatvenaiva prayojanapratītau tathā rājyanirvāsanādayo dharmā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:285: guḍopaskṛtaṃ modakaṃ guḍamodakaṃ tatsthānīyā taccarvaṇākatulyā yā vicitrā vilakṣaṇā carvaṇā rāmagatatvena tattaddharmāvagāhinī pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:286: tasyāḥ padaṃ viṣaya yathā ca mamaiva viṣamabāṇalīlāyām---
GK16andhvc2u:287: tālā jāanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppānti /
GK16andhvc2u:293: locanam eṣa eva sarvatra prayojanasya pratīyamānatvenotkarṣaheturmantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:294: mātragrahaṇena saṃjñī nātra tiraskṛta ityāha---yathā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:301: tena śuddhe 'rthe mukhye bādhānimittaṃ tatrārthe taddharmasamavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:302: tena nimittena rāmaśabdo dharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:314: atra rāmapadalakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ rāmapadavācyatvaṃ sāmānyato duḥkhapātratvaṃ vā bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:317: tadā guṇāḥ atiśayādhāyako dharmo gumastadvantaḥ santaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:330: lakṣmīpātratvādi yaddharmāntaraśataṃ tasya citratā citratāviśiṣṭaṃ taditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:354: anupayogabādhito hyartho 'sya dhvanerviṣayo lakṣaṇā mūlaṃ hyasya /
GK16andhvc2u:355: yattu hṛdayadarpaṇa uktam---'hahā heti saṃrambhārtho 'yaṃ camatkāraḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:358: ahaṃ sahe tasyāḥ ki vartata ityevamātmā hi saṃrambhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:359: kamalapade ca kaḥ saṃrambha ityāstāṃ tāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:369: dvītīyo guṇaśabdaḥ utkṛṣṭatvādidharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ lakṣyatītyādyāśaṅkāṃ parihartumāha---guṇaśabda ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:388: na tu lakṣaṇāyā viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:393: hahāhetyanena gabhyo yassaṃrambhaḥ tasyārthaḥ kāryabhūta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:404: ahaṃ sarvaṃ sahe ityarthasyopodbalako hi rāmaśabdābhivyaktārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:406: mukhyārthasya padārthāntarānvayānupapattijñānamiva prakṛtānuṣayuktatvajñānamapi lakṣaṇābījamato 'nupayuktatvajñānarūpo 'pi mukhyārthabādhāpadārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:423: andho 'yaṃ puro 'pi na paśyatītyatra tiraskārondhārthasya na tvatyantam /
GK16andhvc2u:425: andhaśabdo 'tra padārthasphuṭīkaraṇāśaktatvaṃ naṣṭadṛṣṭigataṃ nimattīkṛtyādarśaṃ lakṣaṇayā pratipādayati /
GK16andhvc2u:440: prakṛtodāraṇe andhapadavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtatvaṃ viśadayitumanyatra tadabhāvaṃ darśayati---andha ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:461: niśvāsāndha iva ya ādarśastadrūpaścandramā iti yojanaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:464: ivaśabdasyobhayatra sambandho 'stviti śaṅkāṃ pariharan āha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:468: gaaṇaṃ ca mattamehaṃ dhārāluliajjuṇāiṃ a vaṇāiṃ /
GK16andhvc2u:470: locanam na ca niḥśvāsenāndha ivādarśaḥ sa iva candra iti kalpanā yuktā /
GK16andhvc2u:473: gaganaṃ ca mattameghaṃ dhārālulitārjunāni ca vanāni /
GK16andhvc2u:479: nirahaṅkāramṛgāṅkā nīlā apiniśā na kevalaṃ sitakarakaradhavalitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:484: na hi svarūpādeva bhedo bhavatītyāṅkya vivaṅkṣitavācyādevāsya bhedo bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:486: bālapriyā gaganaṃ ceti varṣāvarṇanam. ca śabda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:499: pratiṣedhasya prasaktipūrvakatvānnarahaṅkāraśabdo hyahaṅkārasvarūpayogye cetanaviśeṣe eva svarasataḥ prayujyata ityato 'tra mukhyārthasyānvayānupapattirūpabādhā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:523: vivakṣitābhidheyasya dhvaner ātmā dvidhā mataḥ // DhvK_2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:530: locanam samyaṅ na lakṣayituṃ śakyaḥ kramo yasya tādṛśa uddyota uddyotanavyāpāro 'syeti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:537: idānīṃ tu dyotanavyāpāramukhena dyotyasya khātmaniṣṭa evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:538: vyaṅgyasya dhvanerdyetane svātnani kaḥ krama ityāśaṅkyāha----vācyārthāpekṣayeti /
GK16andhvc2u:542: yo rasādirarthaḥ sa evākramo dhvanerātmā na tvakrama eva saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:548: nanu kiṃ sarvadaiva rasādirartho dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:550: etacca sāmānyalakṣaṇe 'guṇīkṛtasvārthāvi'tyatra bālapriyā kuto noktamityata āha---dhvaniśabdetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:564: rasetyādikārikāyāmaṅgibhāvena bhāsamāno rasabhāvādiḥ akramo ghnanerātmā vyavasthita ityanvayo vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:577: aṅgibhāvena bhāsamāna ityasya vivaraṇam--aṅgitvenetyādi etadukteḥ paunaruktyamāśaṅkate--rataccetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:589: yadyapi ca rasenaiva sarvaṃ jīvati kāvyam tathāpi tasya rasasyaikadhanacamatkārātmano 'pi kutaścidaṃśātprayojakībhūtādadhiko 'sau camatkāro bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:590: tatra yadā kaścidudriktāvasthāṃ pratipanno vyabhicārī camatkārātiśayaprayojako bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:592: yathā---- tiṣṭetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:593: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovavartinīṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayoryāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:598: yathā-- yote gotraviparyaye śrutipathaṃ śayyāmanuprāptayā nirdhyātaṃ parivartanaṃ punarapi prārabdhumaṅgīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:601: aṅgibhāvena bhāsamāna ityuktāvaṅgabhāvena bhāne kaḥ prakāra iti jijñāsāyāḥ sambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:632: locanam bhūyastatprakṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ca śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā tanvaṅgyā na tu pāritaḥ stanabharaḥ kraṣṭuṃ priyasyorasaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:633: atra hi praṇayakopasyojjigamiṣayaiva yadavasthānaṃ na tu pārita ityudayāvakāśanirākaraṇāttadevāsvādajīvitam /
GK16andhvc2u:638: atra cerṣyāvipralambhasya rasasyāpi praśama iti śakyaṃ yojayitum /
GK16andhvc2u:640: yathā--- osuru sumṭhi āhaṃ muhu cumbau jeṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:642: ityatra śrutyukte tu kope kopakaṣāyagadgadamandaruditāyā yena mukhaṃ cumbitaṃ tenāmṛtarasanigaraṇaviśrāntiparamparāṇāṃ tṛptirjñāteti kopaprasādasandhiścamatkārasthānam /
GK16andhvc2u:650: śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā pūrvaṃ śithilā śitilīkṛtā paścādanyatra kṣiptā ca ekadorlekhā yayā tathā satyā /
GK16andhvc2u:653: jānātīcchati yatate ceṣṭate iti kramo 'tra pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:656: 'stanabharaḥ priyasya urasaḥ kraṣṭuṃ na pārita' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:672: yadvā---amṛtarasasya viśrāntipūrvakāṇi nigaraṇāni viśramya viśramya nigaraṇāni /
GK16andhvc2u:677: yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc2u:678: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kutadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ sāvasthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati //
GK16andhvc2u:679: atra hi vitakāraitsukye matismaraṇe śahkādainye dhṛticintane parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvena dvandvaśo bhavantī,
GK16andhvc2u:680: paryante tu cintāyā eva pradhānatāṃ dadatī paramāsvādasthānam /
GK16andhvc2u:683: nanvevaṃ vibhāvānubhāvamukhenāpyadhikaścamatkāro dṛśyata iti vibhāvadvaniranubhāvadhvaniśca vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:685: taccarvaṇāpi cittavṛttiṣveva paryavasyatīti rasabhāvebhyo nādhikaṃ carvāṇīyam /
GK16andhvc2u:686: yadā tu vibhāvānubhāvāvapi vyaṅyau bhavatastadā vastudhvanirapi kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc2u:773: yadyapi 'śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsyaḥ' iti muninā nirūpitaṃ tathāpyauttarakālikaṃ tatra hāsyarasatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:774: dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śrutiṃ cetaḥ kālakalāmapi prakurute nāvasthitiṃ tāṃ vinā /
GK16andhvc2u:779: aścābhāsatā yenāsya sītā mayyupekṣikā dviṣṭā veti pratipattirhṛdayaṃ na spṛśatyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:782: ata eva tadābhāsatvaṃ vastutastatra sthāpyate śuktau rajatābhāsavat /
GK16andhvc2u:784: tathā ca tatra hāsyo raso vaktuṃ nyāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:787: taccarvaṇottaramayamananuraktāṃ kāmayata iti rāvaṇāmilāṣādyālamvitasya hāsasya sahṛdayānāmudbodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:789: 'etairākulitasya vikṣatarateraṅgairanaṅgāturaiḥ sampadyeta kathaṃ tadāptisukhaṃmityetanna vejhi sphuṭam' ityuttarārdham /
GK16andhvc2u:791: dūrākarṣaṇaṃ mohaśca tatkārī yo mantraḥ tasminnavetyupamā /
GK16andhvc2u:795: ākulitasya vihvalīkṛtasya vikṣatā naṣṭā ratiḥ viṣayāntareṣu ruciryasya tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:832: śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsya iti prayuñjāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:835: ata evābhilāṣe ekataraniṣṭe 'pi śṛṅgaraśabdena tatra tatra vyavahārastadābhāsatayā mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:837: evaṃ rasadhvanerevāmī bhāvadhvaniprabhṛtayo niṣyandā āsvāde pradhānaṃprayojakamevamaṃśaṃ vibhajya pṛthagvyavasthapyate /
GK16andhvc2u:839: rasadhvanistu sa eva yo 'tra mukhyatayā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyojanoditasthāyi pratipattikasya pratipattuḥ sthāyyaṃśacarvaṇāprayukta evāsvādaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:840: yathā--- kṛcchreṇoruyugaṃ vyatītya suciraṃ bhrāntvā nitambasthale madhye 'syāstrivalītaraṅgaviṣame niḥṣpandatāmāgatā /
GK16andhvc2u:841: maddṛṣṭistṛṣiteva samprati śanerāruhya tuṅgo stanau sākāṅkṣaṃ muhurīkṣate jalalavaprasyandinī locane //
GK16andhvc2u:842: atra hi nāyikākārānuvarṇyamānasvātmapratikṛtipavitritacitraphalakāvalokanādvatsarājasya bālapriyā iti hyoko 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:849: kathaṃ tarhi pṛthagvyavahāra ityata āha---āsvāda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:856: ekāsvādaḥ yaḥ sammūrcchitasya vyāptasya āmodasya upabhogaḥ tasminnapi /
GK16andhvc2u:860: vibhāvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanena taccarvaṇāyā uditā utpannā sthāyipratipattiḥ yasya /
GK16andhvc2u:864: trivalyeva taraṅgaḥ taraṅgatulyā trivalī vā tena viṣame nimnonnate /
GK16andhvc2u:869: atroruyugasya nitambasya cātiviśālatvaṃ madhyasya tanutvaṃ stanayormahatvaṃ ca gamyata iti saundaryātiśayo jalalavetyādinā nāyikāyā virahaduḥkhātiśayasca vyajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:872: nāyikākāreṇa likhitanāyikāpratikṛtyā hetunā anuvarṇyamānaṃ narmasacivaṃ pratimaharvarṇyabhānaṃ svātmapratikṛtyā likhitanāyakapratikṛtyā pavitritaṃ ca,
GK16andhvc2u:875: idānīṃ rasavadalaṅkārādalakṣyakramadyotanātmano dhvanervibhakto viṣaya iti pradarśyate---
GK16andhvc2u:878: rasādi-paratā yatra sa dhvaner viṣayo mataḥ // DhvK_2.4 //
GK16andhvc2u:882: locanam parasparāsthābandharūpo ratisthāyibhāvo vibhāvānubhāvasaṃyojanavaśena carvaṇārūḍha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:892: anayā ca bhaṅgyā rasavadādiṣvalaṅkāreṣu rasādidhvanernāntarbhāva iti sūcayati /
GK16andhvc2u:893: pūrvaṃ hi samāsoktyādiṣu vastudhvanernāntarbhāva iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:894: vācyaṃ ca vācakaṃ ca taccārutvahetavaśceti dvandvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:898: nanūktaṃ bhaṭṭanāyakena---“raso yadā paragatatayā pratīyate tarhi tāṭasthyameva syāt /

GK16andhvc2u:905: vācyetyādikārikāyāṃ 'śabdālaṅkārā' ityādivṛttau cārthāntarabhramaḥ syādityato vivakṣitamarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe---vācyatrcetyādi /

GK16andhvc2u:926: alokasāmānyānāṃ ca rāmādīnāṃ ye samudrasetubandhādayo vibhāvāṃste kathaṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ bhajeyuḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:943: vāsanāyāḥ sahṛdayagataratyādivāsanāyāḥ yo vikākaudbodhaḥ tasya heturyo vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:947: tathā ca sītāyāḥ mānuṣītvena sītādau sahṛdayānāṃ kāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:951: devatāsvamātrādernāyikātvena varṇanasthale devatādāvāradhyatvajñānena pratibandhāttatra kāmyatvarūpakāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:952: nanu kāvyāditaḥ sītādijñāne jāte sahṛdayānāṃ svakāntāsmaraṇaṃ jāyate,

GK16andhvc2u:968: utpattipakṣe ca karuṇasyotpādādduḥkhitve karuṇaprekṣāsu punarapravṛttiḥ syāt /

GK16andhvc2u:972: tena na pratīyate notpadyate nābhivyajyate kāvyena rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:977: tatrābhidhābhāgo yadi śuddhaḥ syāttattantrādibhyaḥ śāstranyāyebhyaḥ śleṣādyalaṅkāraṇāṃ ko bhedaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:989: nanu ratyādirūpo rasaḥ sūkṣmarūpema sahṛdayānāmātmani vartata ityataḥ siddha evetyatrāha---śaktītyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:995: viṣayo ratyādiviṣayaḥ kāntādiḥ abhivyaktyupāya iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:996: tasya arjane sampādane tāratamyapravṛttiḥ taratamabhāvena pravṛttiḥ syāditi /
GK16andhvc2u:997_1: janānāṃ pravṛttistathā vāsanātmatayā antaḥ sthitasya ratyāderadhikādhikābhivyaktaye
GK16andhvc2u:1022: śāstrai locanam tena rasabhāvanākhyo divatīyo vyāpāraḥ;
GK16andhvc2u:1024: taccaitadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma rasān prati yatkāvyasya tadvibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇatvāpādanaṃ nāma /
GK16andhvc2u:1025_0: bhāvite ca rase tasya bhogaḥ yo 'nubhavasmaraṇapratipattibhyo vilakṣaṇa eva drutivistaravikāsātmā
GK16andhvc2u:1026: sa eva ca pradhānabhūtoṃ'śaḥ siddharūpa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1028: bālapriyā “halantyami“ti paṇinīyasūtrādāviva “sarvado mādhava” ityādiśleṣasthale 'pi tantrādinānekārthabodhasambhavādubhayorbhedo na syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1030: vṛttibhedāḥ upanāgarikādyāḥ teṣāṃ vaicitryaṃ ca akiñcitkaramiti /
GK16andhvc2u:1044: rasān prati etadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma taditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1058: tathāca bhāvanopanīto rāmādigataratyādiḥ sthāyī sahṛdayairbhujyamāno rasaḥ ratyādeḥ sādhāraṇyena pratītyā ca na tāṭasthyādidoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1061: anubhavasmaraṇarūpāḥ yāḥ pratīpattayo laukikyaḥ pratītayastābhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1067: nijacitsvabhāvā svātmacaitanyarūpā ca yā nivṛtiḥ lokottarānandaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1068: tasyāṃ viśrāntiḥ vigalitavedyāntaratayā sthitiḥ tallakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1069: atra rajaso guṇasyānuvedhena drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsa iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1070: uktaṃ hi kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---“yadāhi rajaso guṇasya drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsaḥ tadā bhogaḥ svarūpaṃ lamata” iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1077: pratipattṝṇāṃ locanam atrocyate---rasasvarūpa eva tāvadvipratipattayaḥ prativādinām /
GK16andhvc2u:1078: tathāhi-pūrvāvasthāyāṃ yaḥ sthāyī sa eva vyabhicārisampātādinā prāptaparipoṣo 'nukāryagata eva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1080: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ cittavṛttau cittavṛtteḥ cittavṛttyantareṇa kaḥ paripoṣārthaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1081: vismayaśokakrodhādeśca krameṇa tāvanna paripoṣa iti nānukārye rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1104: nāṭyasya nāṭyasambandhī vā raso nāṭyarasa iti vyutpattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1105: matamidaṃ dūṣayitvā prakārāntareṇa vadatāṃ śrīśaṅkukādīnāṃ mataṃ darśayati----pravāhetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1107: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ tattatkāraṇavaśena punaḥ punarutpadyamānāyāṃ naśyantyāṃ ca satyāmiti hetugarbham /
GK16andhvc2u:1116: yathoktaṃ kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---“iṣṭaviyogajo mahān śokaḥ kramema śāmyati,
GK16andhvc2u:1117: na tu dṛḍhībhavati krodhotsāharatayaśca nijanijakāraṇodbhūtā api kālavasādamarṣasthairyasavāviparyaye 'pacīyanta” iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1120: anukāryarāmādigato rasa ityuktapakṣo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1125: layo nāma nṛttagītavādyānāmekatānatārūpaṃ sāmyaṃ rasasya naṭe siddhatvena tadupayogilayādyanusaraṇaṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1132_1: rāmaḥ sukhīti smṛtivilakṣaṇā sthāyini pratītigocaratayāsvādarūpā pratipattiranu kartrālambanā
GK16andhvc2u:1134: kiṃ tvanukāryābhinnābhimate nartake āsvādayitā sāmājika ityetāvanmātramadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1135: tena nāṭya eva bālapriyā tadbhāve ityanuṣajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1137: rāmāderiva sāmājikasyāpi ratyādirūparasotpattau camatkāro na jāyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1155: sthāyino rāmādivyaktiviśeṣavṛttitvavaiśiṣṭyamavabudhya naṭena tadanukāre kriyamāṇe tathaiva sāmājikānāṃ pratītyā tasya taṭasthatvena caturvargopāyavyutpatteranudayādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1156: anena sthāyyanukāro rasa iti pakṣo 'pyayukta iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:1184: tathāvidhapratītirūparasasya nartakaviśeṣyakatvānnartake viśeṣyatāsambandhena satvātsa evāśraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1189: anye tu---anukartari yaḥ sthāyyavabhāso 'bhinayādisāmagpyādikṛto bhittāvivaharitālādinā aśvāvabhāsaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1190: sa eva lokātītatayāsvādāparasaṃjñayā pratītyā rasyamāno rasa iti nāṭyādrasā nāṭyarasāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1191: apare punarvibhāvānubhāvamātrameva viśiṣṭasāmagapyā samarpyamāṇaṃ tadvibhāvanīyānubhāvanīyasthāyirūpacittavṛttyucitavāsanānuṣaktaṃ svanirvṛticarvaṇāviśiṣṭameva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1203: evaṃ sthite prathamapakṣa bālapriyā nāṭye iti chedaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1205: rāmādigatasthāyino 'nukāre naṭe sthāyyavabhāso mithyājñānarūpaḥ sāmājikānāṃ jāyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1206: sa eva camatkārakārī rasa iti kecittanmatamāha----anya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1222: tābhyāṃ vibhavānubhavābhyāṃ kramādvibhāvaniyā anubhāvanīyā ca yā ratyādisthāyirūpacittavṛtyucitā vāsanā sāmājikagatā tadanuṣaktaṃ tatsambaddham /
GK16andhvc2u:1224: svasya sāmājikasya nirvṛtirūpā yā carvaṇā tadviśiṣṭaṃ tadviṣayabhūtam /
GK16andhvc2u:1227: 'śuddhaṃ vibhāvam' ityādau sarvatra rasamāhurityasya sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1229: “svabhāvābhinayopetaṃ na nāstrīpuruṣāśrayaṃ nāṭyaṃ lokadharmi” “svarālaṅkārasaṃyuktamasvasthapuruṣāśrayaṃ nāṭyaṃ nāṭyadharmi” tatsthānīyena tattulyena /
GK16andhvc2u:1235: alaukiko laukikaśabdavyatiriktaḥ prasanno madhura ojasvī ca yaḥ śabdaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1250: kiṃ tu yathā pratītimātratvenāviśiṣṭatve 'pi prātyakṣikī ānumānikī āgamotthā pratibhānakṛtā yogipratyakṣajā ca pratītirupāyavailakṣṇyādanyaiva,

GK16andhvc2u:1273: piśāco hi viśiṣyājñātatvenātrāyaṃ viśāca ityādi lokavyavahārānarhaḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:1330: bhojarājena sūtradvayamidamitthaṃ vivṛtam--iha nānāyoniṣu bhramatāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ kāñcidyonimanubhūya yadā yonyantarasahasravyavadhānena punastāmeva yoniṃ pratipadyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1331_0: tadā tasyāṃ pūrvānubhūtāyāṃ yonau tathāvidhaśarīrādivyañjakāpekṣayā yā vāsanāḥ prakaṭībhūtā
GK16andhvc2u:1332: jātideśakālavyavadhāne 'pi tāsāṃ svanurūpasmṛtyādiphalasādhane ānantaryaṃ nairantaryaṃ kutaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1342: tadā kiṃ vāsanānimitta uta nirnimitta iti śaṅkāṃ vyapanetumāha--'tāsāṃ'vāsanānāṃ 'anāditva' masti, kutaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1343: 'āśiṣo nityatvāt' seyamāśīrmahāmoharūpā sadaiva sukhasādhanāni me bhūyāsurmā kadācana tairme viyogo 'bhūditi yaḥ saṅkalpaviśeṣo vāsanānāṃ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ nityatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1344: etaduktaṃ bhavati---kāraṇasya sannihitatvādanubavasaṃskārādīnāṃ kāryaṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ kena vāryata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1363: kiñca bhāvakatvasvīkāre raso notpadyata iti bhavadīyapratijñāyā bhaṅge 'pyāpatati ityāha---kāvyaṃ cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1367: locanam tatra bhavataiva bhāvanādutpattipakṣa eva pratyujjīvitaḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:1374: iti tryaṃsāyāmapi bhāvanāyāṃ karaṇāṃśe dhvananavyāpāra eva mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1375: tacacedaṃ bhogakṛttvaṃ rasasya dhvananītyatve siddhe daivasiddham /
GK16andhvc2u:1393: itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ prayājādikriyākalāpaśca itikartavyatātvena tasyāṃ bhāvanāyamanvetīti mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1394: tathā ca yajetetyādivaidikavākyaṃ svargamudṛsya puruṣaṃ prati vidhāyakatvena yathā bhāvakaṃ yāgena karaṇena prayājādītikartavyatayā svargārthinaḥ svargaṃbhāvayati,
GK16andhvc2u:1395: tathā kāvyaṃ bhāvakaṃ vyañjakatvavyāpāreṇa karaṇena guṇālaṅkāraucityādirūpayā itikartavyatayā sagṛdayasya rasaṃ bhāvayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1409: kriyata evetyarthaḥ. nana kriyata iti vā pāṭhaṃ(?)

GK16andhvc2u:1418: rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamalakṣaṇaṃ mukhyamarthamanuvartamānā yatra śabdārthālaṅkārā guṇāśca parasparaṃ dhvanyapekṣayā vibhinnarūpā vyavasthitāstatra kāvye dhvaniriti vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1423: yathā rāmastathāhamityupamānātiriktāṃ rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvijṛmbhārūpāṃ vyutpattimante karotīti kamupālabhāmahe /
GK16andhvc2u:1424: tasmātsthitametat---abhiviyajyante rasāḥ pratītyaiva ca rasyanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1435: rasyamānatayā hetunā udito yaścamatkāraḥ camatkāratmakaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ tadanatiriktatvāttabhinnatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1454: iti yadupamānamityākārikā yā upamitiḥ sādṛśyadhīḥ śāstretihāsābhyāṃ kriyamāṇā tadatiriktāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1458: rasāsvādopāyabhūtā svasya pratipattuḥ yā pratibhā tasyā vijṛmbho vikāsastadrūpāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1461: punaḥ punaḥ kāvyapariśīlane hi rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvikāso bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1462: ante karotītyanenādāvuktopamitirūpāṃ vyutpattiṃ ci karotīti jñāpyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1475: kāvye tasminn alaṅkāro rasādir iti me matiḥ // DhvK_2.5 //
GK16andhvc2u:1479_0: yadyapi rasavadalaṅkārasyānyairdarśito viṣayastathāpi yasmin kāveya pradhānatayānyo
GK16andhvc2u:1479_1: 'rtho vākyārthībhūtastasya cāṅgabhūtā ye rasādayaste rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣayā iti māmakīnaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1480: tadyathā cāṭuṣu preyolaṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc2u:1483: me matirityanyapakṣaṃ dūpyatvena hṛdi nidhāyābhīṣṭatatvātsvapakṣaṃ pūrvaṃ darśayati--tathāpiti /
GK16andhvc2u:1484: sa hi paradarśito viṣayo bhāvinītyānopapanna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1485: yasmin kāvye iti spaṣṭatvenāsaṅgataṃ vākyamitthaṃ yojanīyam--yasmin kāvye te pūrvoktā rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā vākyārthībhūtaścānyo 'rthaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1487: tasya kāvyasya sambandhino ye rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtāste rasāderalaṅkārasya rasavadādyalaṅkāraśabdasya viṣayāḥ;
GK16andhvc2u:1494: bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa cāṭuṣu preyolaṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyanta itīdamekaṃ vākyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1509: tasya cāṅgabhūtā ityatra tatpadena kāvyasyaiva parāmṛśyatayā yathāśrute tadarthasya tannirūpitāṅgatvasya rasādāvasambhavenāsaṅgatārthakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1511: te rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā ityasya pūrvavākye 'pi sambandha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1519: tathāca tasyeti ṣaṣṭhyantārthasya kāvyasambandhitvasya rasādāvanvayānnāsaṅgatārthakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1525: cāṭuṣvityādi dṛśyanta ityantamekaṃ vākyamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1530: locanam tatra preyānalaṅkāro yatra sa preyolaṅkāro 'laṅkaraṇīya ihoktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1534: udbhaṭamatānusāriṇastu bhaṅktvā vyācakṣate---cāṭuṣu cāṭuviṣaye vākyarthatve cāṭūnāṃ vākyārthatve preyolaṅkārasyāpi viṣaya iti pūrvoṇa sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1535: udbhaṭamate hi bhāvālaṅkāra eva preya ityuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1538: rasavacchabdena preyaḥśabdena ca sarva eva rasavadādyalaṅkārā upalakṣitāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1539: tadevāha---rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyanta iti uktaviṣaya iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1542: adya yā mama govinda jātā tvayi gṛhāgate //
GK16andhvc2u:1546: cāṭusthale 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau varṇyamānanarapatiprabhāvādereva vākyārthatā na tu preyorūpālaṅkārasyetyataḥ tatpadaṃ bahuvrīhitvāśrayeṇa vyācaṣṭe---preyānityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1552: aho narapateḥ prabhāvo yenaivaṃ durdaśā ripustrijano 'nubhavatīti prabhāvālambitāyāḥ prīteḥ ripustrījanavṛttāntaviṣayakatvāccamatkāritvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1574: anubhāvādītyādiśabdena vibhāvavyabhicārisvaśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamatra bhāvanāmalaṅkārateti ca tadvyākhyātā pratīhārendurājaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1578: sa ca rasādiralaṅkāraḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇī vā /
GK16andhvc2u:1579: tatrādyo yathā--- kiṃ hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punaḥ prāptaścirādṛrśanaṃ keyaṃ niṣkaruma pravāsarucitā kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1580: svapnānteṣviti te vadan priyatamavyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā roditi riktabāhuvalayastāraṃ ripustrījanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1593: svapnānteṣu svapnāyiteṣu suptapralatiteṣu punaḥpunarudbhūtatayā bahuṣviti vadanyuṣmākaṃ sambandhī ripustrījanaḥ bālapriyā prayeśśabdeneti /
GK16andhvc2u:1606: tatra rasavadalaṅkāraḥ bhāvālaṅkāraśca sta ityudabhaṭamatānurodhena paṅktyartha iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1629: locanam priyatame viśeṣemāsaktaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yena tādṛśa eva san buddhvā śūnyavalayākārīkṛtabāhupāśaḥ san tāraṃ muktakaṇṭhaṃ roditīti /
GK16andhvc2u:1630: atra śokasthāyibhāvena svapnadarśanoddīpitena karuṇarasena carvyamāṇena sundarībhūto narapatiprabhāvo bhātīti karuṇaḥ śuddha evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1631: na hi tvayā ripavo hatā iti yādṛganalaṅkṛto 'yaṃ vākyārthastādṛgayam,
GK16andhvc2u:1634: candrādinā vastunā tathā vastvantaraṃ vadanādyalaṅkriyate tadupamitatvena cārutayāvabhāsāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1635: tathā rasenāpi vastu vā rasāntaraṃ vopaskṛtaṃ sundaraṃ bhāti iti rasasyāpi vastuna ivālaṅkāratve ko virodhaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1639: rasenāpi tarhi sarasīkriyate so 'rtha iti svasaṃvedyametat /
GK16andhvc2u:1640: tena yatkecidacūcudan--'atra rasena vibhāvādīnāṃ madhye kimalaṅkriyate' iti tadanabhyupagamaparāhatam;
GK16andhvc2u:1642: asyārthasya bhūyasā lakṣye bālapriyā bahuṣviti bahuvacanārthavivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:1645: 'atra narapatiprabhāvaḥ tathāvidhena karuṇarasena sundarībhūto bhātī'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1672: 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau varṇitena ripustrījanavṛttāntena taddhetubhūtapriyatamavināśapratyāyanadvārā narapatiprabhāvaḥ pratyāyyata iti sa eva prastutārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1676: saṅkīrṇo rasādiraṅgabhūto yathā---- kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadārno 'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:1682: avadhūta iti na pratīpsitaḥ bālapriyā kṣipta ityādyamarukastham /
GK16andhvc2u:1684: āliṅganyo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1685: ityatra tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatver irṣyāvipralambhasya śloṣasahitasyāṅgabhāva iti,
GK16andhvc2u:1687: ata eva cerṣyāvipralambhakaruṇayoraṅgatvena vyavasthānātsamāveśo na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1693: yadyapyatra karuṇo raso vāstavo 'pyasti tathāpi sataccārutvapratītyai na vyāpriyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇa śleṣasahitasyetyetāvadevā vocat na tu karumasahitasyetyapi /
GK16andhvc2u:1699: yadi hyanyatarasya rasasya prādhānyamabhaviṣyanna dvitīyo rasaḥ samāviśet /
GK16andhvc2u:1701: sa ca śokasthāyibhāvatvena nirapekṣabhāvasya karuṇasya viruddha eva /
GK16andhvc2u:1702: evamalaṅkāraśabdaprasaṅgena samāveśaṃ prasādhya bālapriyā 'śarāgniḥ vaḥ duritaṃ dahatvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1703: sa kaḥ? ya ārdraḥ tatkalabhavaḥ aparādho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1737: tatra sarvāsāmalaṅkṛtīnāmityasya yatra hi rasasya vākyārthībhāvastatra kathamalaṅkāratvam?
GK16andhvc2u:1742: locanam evaṃvidha eveti yaduktaṃ tatraivakārasyābhiprāyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yatra hīti /
GK16andhvc2u:1744: athaṃ bhāvaḥ---upamādīnāmalaṅkāratve yādṛśī vārtā tādṛśyeva rasādīnām /
GK16andhvc2u:1782: teṣāṃ yadaucityaṃ tatsūcanātmatayā tatsūcanasvabhāvakatayā tattadalaṅkārā hyasyethaṃ cittavṛttiruciteti sūcayanti;
GK16andhvc2u:1783: yathā yuvajanaśarīragatā hārakaṭakakuṇḍalādayaḥ tadrāgitvasyaucityaṃ yattiśarīragatā daṇḍakaṣāyavastrādayastadvairāgyasyaucityaṃ ceti tatsūcakatvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1785: tasmādyatra rasādayo vākyārthībhūtāḥ sa sarvaḥ na rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1788: yatra tu prādhānyenārthāntarasya vākyārthībhāve rasādibhiścārutvaniṣpattiḥ kriyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1790: evaṃ dhvanerupamādīnāṃ rasavadalaṅkārasya ca vibhaktaviṣayatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1791: yadi tu cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo rasādyalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate locanam śavaśarīraṃ kuṇḍalādyupetamapi na bhāti,
GK16andhvc2u:1795: na hi dehasya kiñcidanaucityamiti vastuta ātmaivālaṅkāryaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1804: yatra rasasyālaṅkāryatā rasāntaraṃ cāṅgabhūtaṃ nāsti tatra śuddhā evopamādayaḥ tena saṃsṛṣṭyā nopamādīnāṃ viṣayāpahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1812: yaterātmanaśca rāgitvamanucitamityato yatiśarīragatāḥ kaṭakādayo hāsyāvahā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1813: tattaccetanaśarīragataiḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādibhiḥ sūcyasya rāgitvādicittavṛttiviśeṣasya tattaccetanocitatve teṣāmalaṅkāratā,
GK16andhvc2u:1818: na tu samānādhikaraṇe tatpade iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1820: rasādiniṣṭhā yā alaṅkāratā alaṅkriyākartṛtvaṃ rasādikartṛkālaṅkriyeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:1821: sa eva tasyā viṣaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1826: sa sarvo na rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣaya iti vākya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1837: locanam tatra bhāvālaṅktārasya śuddhasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā--- tava śatapatrapatramṛdutāmratalaścaramaścalakalahaṃsanūpurakaladhvaninā mukharaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1838: mahiṣamahāsurasya śirasi prasabhaṃ nihitaḥ kanakamahāmahīdhragurutāṃ kathamamba gataḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1841: rasābhāsasyālaṅkāratā yathā mamaiva stotre--- samastaguṇasampadaḥ samamalaṅkriyāṇāṃ gaṇair-- bhavanti yadi bhūṣaṇaṃ tava tathāpi no śobhase /
GK16andhvc2u:1842: śivaṃ hṛdayavallabhaṃ yadi yathā tathā rañjayeḥ tadeva nanu vāṇi te bhavati sarvalalokottaram //
GK16andhvc2u:1843: atra hi parameśastutimātraṃ vācaḥ paramopādeyamiti vākyārthe śṛṅgārābhāsaścārutvahetuḥ śloṣasahitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1844: na hyayaṃ pūrṇaḥ śṛṅgāro nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1852: tasya patramiva mṛṭu tāmraṃ ca talamadhobhāgo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1853: calakalahaṃsatulyo nūpuraḥ tasya dhvaninā mukharaḥ sa śabdaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1857: kanakamayo mahāṃśca yo mahīdhraḥ parvataḥ sumeruḥ tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:1866: tathāpi mṛdutāmratala ityetāvanmātroktāvapi vitarkādeḥ sambhavādupamāyāstadaṅgatvābhāvāttadasaṅkīrṇatvarūpaṃ śuddhatvaṃ sughaṭam /
GK16andhvc2u:1869: nanu vāṇi / samastānāṃ guṇānāṃ mādhuryādīnāmatha ca saundaryādīnāṃ sampadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1885: nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca sati śṛṅgāraḥ pūrṇo na bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:1886: ato 'yaṃ tarhyupamādīnāṃ praviralaviṣayatā nirviṣayatā vābhihitā syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1888: atha satyāmapi tasyāṃ yatrācetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo nāsau rasavadalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1889: tat mahataḥ kāvyaprabandhasya rasanidhānabhūtasya nīrasatvamabhihitaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1891: bhāvābhāsāṅgatā yathā--- sa pātu vo yasya hatāvaśeṣāstattulyavarṇāñjanarañjiteṣu /
GK16andhvc2u:1896: parasya cāyamāśayaḥ---acetanānāṃ cittavṛttirūparasādyasambhavāttadvarṇane rasavadalaṅkārasyānāśaṅkyatvāttadvibhakta evopamādīnāṃ viṣaya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1904: yatra hi rasastatrāvaśyaṃ rasavadalaṅkāra iti paramatam /
GK16andhvc2u:1905: tato na rasavadalaṅkāraścennūnaṃ tatra raso nāstīti paramatābhiprāyānnīrasatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc2u:1917: tatrrāsasya bhagavatprabhāvavibhāvitāyāṃ ratau guṇībhāvādbhāvābhāsa ūrjasvyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1942: mata iti taraṅgabhrūbhaṅgā kṣubhitavihagaśreṇiraśanā vikarṣantī phenaṃ vasanamiva saṃrambhaśithilam /
GK16andhvc2u:1943: yathāviddhaṃ yāti skhalitamabhisandhāya bahuśo nadīrūpeṇeyaṃ dhruvamasahanā sā pariṇatā //
GK16andhvc2u:1944: yathā va--- tanvī meghajalārdrapallavatayā dhautādharevāśrubhiḥ śūnyevābharaṇaiḥ svakālavirahādviśrāntapuṣpodnamā /
GK16andhvc2u:1946: taraṅgā eva bhrūbhaṅgā yasyāḥ vikarṣantāṃ vilambamānaṃ balādākṣipantī /
GK16andhvc2u:1950: atha ca madviyogapaścāttāpā sahiṣṇustāpaśāntaye nadībhāvaṃ gateti /
GK16andhvc2u:1977: evaṃ kṣubhitavihāgaśreṇireva raśanā yasyā iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1988: ata eva pādapatitaṃ māmavadhūya tiraskṛtya sthitā /
GK16andhvc2u:1994: meghajālairārdrāḥ pallavā yasyāṃ tasya bhāvaḥ tattā,
GK16andhvc2u:1995: tayā hetunā aśrubhiḥ dhautaḥ adharo yasyāḥ sā iva /
GK16andhvc2u:1999: cintā maunamivāśritā madhukṛtāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sa //
GK16andhvc2u:2000: yathā vā---- teṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdāṃ rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇāṃ kṣemaṃ bhadra kalindaśailatanayātīre latāveśmanām /
GK16andhvc2u:2001: vicchinne smaratalpakalpanamṛducchedopayoge 'dhunā te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vigalannīlatviṣaḥ pallavāḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:2003: kimiti pādapatitamapi dayitamavadhūtavatyahamiti ca cintayā maunam /
GK16andhvc2u:2005: etau ślokau nadīlatāvarṇanaparau tātparyeṇa purūravasa unmādākrāntasyoktirūpau /
GK16andhvc2u:2007: he bhadra / teṣamiti ye mamaiva hṛdaye sthitāsteṣām /
GK16andhvc2u:2011: kalindaśailatanayā yamunā tasyāstīre latāgṛhāṇāṃ kṣemaṃ kuśalamiti kākvā praśnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2012_1: dvārakāgato bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ---smaratalpasya madanaśayyāyāḥ kalpanārthaṃ mṛdu sukumāraṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2013: atha ca smaratalpe yatkalpanaṃ klṝptiḥ sa eva mṛduḥ sukumāra utkṛṣṭaśchedopayogastroṭanaphalaṃ tasminvicchinne /
GK16andhvc2u:2024: gopeti gopadarśanena prabuddhā udbuddhāḥ saṃskārāḥ latāveśmādyanubhavajanitāḥ saṃskārā yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2041: svasya gopīnāṃ ca yaḥ ityevamādau viṣaye 'cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāve 'pi cetanavastuvṛttāntayojanāstyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:2043: tadevaṃ satyupamādayo nirviṣayāḥ praviralaviṣayā vā syuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2046: mayi tu sannihite 'navaratakathitopayogānneme jarājīrṇatākhilīkāraṃ kadācidavāpnuvantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2052: nanu yatra cetanavṛttasya sarvathā nānupraveśaḥ sa upamāderviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha--yasmādityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2056: atijaḍo 'pi candrodyānaprabhṛtiḥ svaviśrānto 'pi varṇyamāno 'vaśyaṃ cittavṛttivibhāvatāṃ tyaktvā bālapriyā parasparālambano 'nurāgaḥ tanniścayagarbhamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2057: tanniścayābhāve vakṣyamāṇamanupaṃpannaṃ bhavet gopīnāṃ puruṣāntararamaṇe tadupayogasambhavāditi /
GK16andhvc2u:2062: anavarato yaḥ kathitopayogaḥ pūrvoktopayogaḥ tasya yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:2081: 'yatrāntato vibhāvatvena cetanavastuvṛttāntayojanā nāsti asāvacetanavastuvṛttānto nāstī'ti vṛttānvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2094: yaḥ punaraṅgī raso bhāvo vā sarvākāramalaṅkāryaḥ sa dhvanerātmeti /
GK16andhvc2u:2097: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2098: aṅgāśritās tv alaṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvK_2.6 //
GK16andhvc2u:2102: yetamarthaṃ rasādilakṣaṇamaṅginaṃ santamavalambante te gumāḥ śauryādivat /
GK16andhvc2u:2107: yataḥ parokto viṣayavibhāgo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2121: kevalaṃ prathamābhiprāye prathamaṃ kārikārdhaṃ dṛṣṭāntābhiprāyeṇa vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc2u:2126: na hi tadasti vastu yanna kiñjiccittavṛttiviśeṣamudbodhayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2155: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2156: tan-mayaṃ kāvyam āśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati // DhvK_2.7 //
GK16andhvc2u:2158: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2161: tatkathamuktaṃ rasādikamaṅginaṃ guṇā āśritā ityāśaṅkyāha--tatā cetyadi /
GK16andhvc2u:2165: ratau hi samastadevatiryaṅnarādijātiṣvavicchinnaiva vāsanāsta iti na kaścittatra tādṛgyo na hṛdayasaṃvādamayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2168: madhuro hi śarkarādiraso vivekino 'vivekināṃ v svasthasyāturasya vā jhaṭiti rasanānipatitastāvadabhilaṣaṇīya eva bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:2170: sa śṛṅgāra ātmatvena prakṛto yatra vyaṅgyatayā /
GK16andhvc2u:2197: kārikāyāṃ madhura ityādinā ayamartho 'pi dṛṣṭāntavidhayā vivakṣita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2202: tanmayamityatra “tatprakṛtavacane mayaḍi“ti sūtreṇa mayaḍiti vyācaṣṭe--sa ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2204: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--vastuto mādhuryaṃ nāma śṛṅgārāde rasasyaiva guṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2216: mādhuryam ārdratāṃ yāti yatas tatrādhikaṃ manaḥ // DhvK_2.8 //
GK16andhvc2u:2220: locanam vyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayorupacaritaṃ madhuraśṛṅgārarasābhivyaktisamarthatā śabdārthayormādhuryamiti hi lakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:2227: 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ' ityatra hi śravyatvamasamastatvaṃ cāstyeveti bhāvaḥ // 7 //
GK16andhvc2u:2229: tato 'pi madhuratamaḥ karuma iti tadabhivyañjanakauśalaṃ śabdārthayorbhadhurataratvaṃ madhuratamatvaṃ cetyabhiprāyeṇāha--śṛṅgāra ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2234: sahṛdayasya cetaḥ svābhāvikamanāviṣṭatvātmakaṃ kāṭhinyaṃ krodhādidoptarūpatvaṃ bālapriyā śṛṅgāreti /
GK16andhvc2u:2259: tatpadena madhuratarasya madhuratamasya ca rasasya parāmarśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2277: raudrādayo hi rasāḥ parāṃ dīptimujjavalatāṃ janayantīti lakṣaṇayā ta locanam vismayahāsādirāgitvaṃ ca tyajatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2279: krameṇetyāśayaḥ tena karuṇe 'pi sarvathaiva cittaṃ dravatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:2284: api tvātmabhūtasya rasasyaiva paramārthato guṇā mādhuryādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2295: tathā cārdratā nā cittasya śṛṅgārādicarvaṇājanyaḥ kāṭhinyādiparityāgaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2315: uttataratra ” hāsyabhayānakabībhatsaśānteṣvi“tyatra “bībhatse 'pyevami“tyatra ca bībhatsapadasthāne adbhatapadaṃ ca paṭhanīyaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:2317: tatra śānte mādhuryamātrakathanaṃ matāntarābhiprāyeṇa yojyamiti pratibhāti /
GK16andhvc2u:2319: vikāsarūpo yo vistāraḥ tadrūpaṃ yatprajvalanaṃ tatsvabhāva tatsvarūpā dīptirnāma tathāvidhā eva dīptirityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2322: tayā dīptyā āsvādaviśeṣātmikayā kāryarūpayā lakṣyante rasāntarātpṛthaktayā /
GK16andhvc2u:2324: tato lakṣitalakṣaṇayā tatprakāśanaparaḥ śabdo dīrghasamāsaracanavākyarūpo 'pi dīptirityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2349: tatprakāśanaparaḥ śabda ityasyaiva viviraṇaṃ dīrghetyādīti sphuṭīkartumāha--dīrgheti /
GK16andhvc2u:2350: dīptirityucyata iti yathā---- cañcadbhujabhramitacaṇḍagadābhidhāta-- sañcūrṇitoruyugalasya suyodhanasya /

GK16andhvc2u:3043: tathā ca paryāyoktasya prādhānye 'pi na kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:3059: adyodyānalatāmimāṃ samadanāṃ nārīmivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmyaham //
GK16andhvc2u:3060: locanam tathā ca granthakāra evamagre darśayiṣyati /
GK16andhvc2u:3061: mahātmanāṃ dūṣaṇoddhoṣaṇamātmana eva dūṣaṇamiti nedaṃ dūṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ dattam /
GK16andhvc2u:3067: saha madanākhyena vṛkṣaviśeṣema madanena kāmena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:3068: atropamāśleṣar irṣyāvipralambhasya bhāvino mārgapariśodhaktvena sthitastaccarvaṇābhimukhyaṃ kurvannavasare rasasya pramukhībhāvadaśāyāṃ puraḥsarāyamāṇo gṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3073: svaparigṛhītāṃ nabamālikālatāṃ dohadaviśeṣeṇa puṣpitāmavagatavato vatsarājasya narmasacivaṃ prati vacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:3074: 'ahamadya imāmudyānalatāmanyāṃ nārīmiva paśyan devyā mukhaṃ kopavipāṭaladyuti kariṣyāmī'tyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3076: tatpaśyantyā svaparigṛhītamādhavīlatāyāḥ puṣpodgamābhāvena janitakopāyā vāsavadattāyā mukhamātāmradyupi yathā bhaviṣyati tathā kariṣyāmītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3078: uttarārdhasya spaṣṭārthakatvaṃ manyamānaḥ pūrvārdhaṃ vyācaṣṭe---uddāmā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3102: yathā---- raktastvaṃ navapallavairahamapi ślādhyaiḥ priyāyā guṇai- stvāmāyānti śilīmukhāḥ smaradhanurmuktāstathā māmapi /
GK16andhvc2u:3103: kāntāpādatalāhītastava mude tadvanmamāpyāvayoḥ sarvaṃ tulyamaśoka kevalamahaṃ dhātrā saśokaḥ kṛtaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3109: tatra ca prabodhako vibhāvastadīyaṣallavarāga iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3116: priyāyā guṇairanurakto 'hamudbuddhānurāga iti tantrādinā arthaṃ iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3127: yatastvāṃ smadhanurmuktāḥ kāmacāpānnirgatāḥ śilīmukhāḥ bhramarā āyānti,
GK16andhvc2u:3128: tato māmapi tathā smaradhanurmuktāḥ kāmacāpānnirgatāḥ śilīmukhāḥ śarā āyānti /
GK16andhvc2u:3130: yadyapyatra kāntāpādatalenāhatiḥ tava mude puṣpavikāsāya bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:3131: tadvattathā kāntāpādatalāhatiḥ ratabandhaviśeṣaḥ mama mude santoṣāya bhavatīti yatāśrutārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3132: tatāpi svakāntāpādatalāhananenāśokasya puṣpavikāse sati nāyakasya santīṣo bhavatīti yatastava mude tato mamāpi mude iti hetutvena vyākhyeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3133: atra hi prabandhapravṛtto 'pi śloṣo vyatirekavivakṣayā tyajyamāno rasaviśeṣaṃ puṣṇāti /
GK16andhvc2u:3137: yatra hi śleṣaviṣaya eva śabde prākarāntareṇa vyatirekapratītirjāyate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3141: saśokaśabdena vyatirekamānayatā śokasahabhūtānāṃ nirvedacintādīnāṃ vyabhicāriṇāṃ vipralambhaparipoṣakāṇāmavakāśo dattaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3144: tatra kiṃ tyaktaṃ kiṃ vā gṛhītamiti parasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3148: saḥ hariḥ, yadi vā saha haribhiḥ sahaririti /
GK16andhvc2u:3158: prakṛtarasānuguṇālaṅkārāntaravivakṣayā gṛhītapūrvasyālaṅkārasya tyāgaḥ prakṛtarasāṅgaṃ bhavatīti prakṛte vyatirekasya vipralambhapoṣakatvaṃ vivṛṇoti---saśokaśabdenetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3173: alaṅkāradvayasya yā pratibhā pratītistasyā ullāsaḥ udaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3183: aśvavācino hariśabdasya sahaśabdena samāsa ityāśayena dvitīyaṃ sahariśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3190: antyapāde atra hyanya eva śabdaḥ śleṣasya viṣayo 'nyaśca vyatirekasya /
GK16andhvc2u:3191: yadi caivaṃvidhe viṣaye 'laṅkārāntaratvakalpanā kriyate tatsaṃsṛṣṭerviṣayāpahāra eva syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3192: śleṣamukhainaivātra vyatirekasyātmalābha iti nāyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭerviṣaya iti cet--na;
GK16andhvc2u:3196: yathā--- no kalpāpāyavāyoradayarayadalatkṣyādhārasyāpi śamyā locanam atra hīti /
GK16andhvc2u:3202: evaṃvidhe vākyalakṣaṇe viṣaye viṣaya ityekatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3206: upamā ca śleṣamukhenaivāyāteti śleṣo 'tra vyatirekasyānugrāhaka iti saṅkarasyaivaiṣa viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3211: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---kiṃ sarvatropamāyāḥ svaśabdenābhidhāne vyatireko bhavatyuta gamyamānatve /
GK16andhvc2u:3236: sā prasiddhā eva vartiḥ vaḥ sukhayatviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3237: anyarūpetyanena darśitaṃ dīptervaidharmyaṃ no katpetyādinā kathyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3239: vāyoriti kartari ṣaṣṭī gāḍhamudgīrṇā gāḍhodgīrṇojjvalaśrīrahani na rahitā no tamaḥkajjalena /
GK16andhvc2u:3240: prāptotpattiḥ pataṅgānna punarupagatā moṣamuṣṇātviṣo vo vartiḥ saivānyarūpā sukhayatu nikhiladvīpadīpasya dīptiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3241: atra hi sāmyaprapañjapratipādanaṃ vinaiva vyatareko darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3242: nātra locanam tama eva kajjalaṃ tena /
GK16andhvc2u:3243: na no rahitāṃ api tu rahitaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:3249: sāmyasyopamāyāḥ prapañcena prabandhena yatpratipādanaṃ svaśbadena tena vināpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3250: etaduktaṃ bhavati---pratīyamānaivopamā vyatirekasyānugrāhiṇī bhavantī nābhidhānaṃ svakaṇṭhenāpekṣate /
GK16andhvc2u:3254: tadaprāvaṇye svayaṃ cārutvahetutvābhāvāditi śleṣopamātra pṛthagalaṅkārabhāvameva na bhajate /
GK16andhvc2u:3256: etadasiddhaṃ svasaṃvedanabādhitatvāditi hṛdaye gṛhītvā svasaṃvedanamapahnuvānaṃ bālapriyā āvirbhāvitā ujvalā śrīryayā sā /
GK16andhvc2u:3283: kintu vyatirekema sahānugrahyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ bhajate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3286: vṛttau--'atra śleṣasya vyatirekāṅgatvenaiva vivakṣitatvāt śleṣamātraccārutvapratītirnāsti iti na svato 'laṅkāratā ityapi na vācyam' ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3295: śleṣamātrāccārutvapratītirastīti śleṣasya vyatirekāṅgatvenaiva vivakṣitatvāt na svato 'laṅkāratetyapi na vācyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3296: yata evaṃvide viṣaye sāmyamātrādapi supratipāditāccārutvaṃ dṛśyata eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3298: antarme dayitāmukhaṃ tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samaivāvayo- statkiṃ māmaniśaṃ sakhe jaladhara tvaṃ dagdhamevodyataḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3300: locanam paraṃ śleṣaṃ vinopamāmātrema cārutvasampannamudāharaṇāntaraṃ darśayanniruttarīkaroti--yata ityādinā /
GK16andhvc2u:3311_0: 'ākrandā' ityādisthale śleṣaṃ vinā upamāgarbhavyatirekeṇaiva cārutvasya darśanā'draktastva'mityādāvapi
GK16andhvc2u:3311_1: śleṣasya vyatirekānugrāhakatvaṃ vinā pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ bhavatyeveti parihāragranthābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3314: me ākrandāḥ tava stanitaitaistulyā ityādi sambandhanīyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3341: yathā--- kopātkomalalobāhulatikāpāśena baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ nītvā vāsaniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3342: bhūyo naivamiti skhalatkalagirā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ dhanyo hanyata eva ninhutiparaḥ preyānrudatyā hasan //
GK16andhvc2u:3343: atra he rūpakamākṣiptamanirvyūḍhaṃ ca paraṃ rasapuṣṭaye /
GK16andhvc2u:3344_0: nirvoḍhumiṣṭamapi yaṃ yatnādaṅgatvena pratyavekṣate yathā--- śyāmāsvaṅgaṃ cakitahariṇīprekṣaṇe
GK16andhvc2u:3344_1: dṛṣṭipātaṃ locanam evaṃ grahaṇatyāgau samarthya 'nātinirvahaṇaiṣitā' iti bhāgaṃ vyācaṣṭe--raseti /
GK16andhvc2u:3347: dayitā vyādhavadhūḥ vāsagṛhaṃ kārāgārapañjarādīti paramanaucityaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3349: bhavatyo 'navarataṃ bruvate nāyamevaṃ karotīti tatpaśyantvidānīmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3350: skhalantī kopāveśena kalā madhurā ca gīryasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc2u:3352: evamiti yaduktaṃ tatkimityāha--duśceṣṭitaṃ nakhapadāda saṃsūcya aṅgulyādinirdeśena /
GK16andhvc2u:3355: yato 'sau hasanaṃ nimittīkṛtya nihnutiparaḥ priyatamaśca tadīyaṃ vyalīlaṃ kā soḍhuṃ samartheti /
GK16andhvc2u:3360: dayitādīnāṃ vyādhavadhūtvādirūpaṇasya kathanena bāhulatikāyāḥ pāśatvarūpaṇaṃ kavirnirvāhayedyadītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3376: śyāmānāṃ viśiṣyoktau bījabhūtamaṅgasāthadharmyaṃ gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān /
GK16andhvc2u:3377: atpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kvacidapi na te bhīru sādṛśyamasti //
GK16andhvc2u:3381: lakṣyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ mahākaviprabandheṣvapi dṛśyate bahuśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3382: tattu sūktitasahasradyotitātmānāṃ mahātmanāṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇamātmana eva dūṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti na vibhajya darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3383_0: kiṃ tu rūpakāderalaṅkāravargasya yeyaṃ vyañjakatve rasādiviṣaye lakṣaṇadigdarśitā
GK16andhvc2u:3383_2: locanam pāṇḍamnā tanimnā kaṇṭakitatvena ca yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3388: ekasthasādṛśyābhāve ha dolāyamāno 'haṃ sarvatra sthito na kutracidekasya dhṛtiṃ labha iti bhāva /
GK16andhvc2u:3390: yo hi kātarahṛdayo bhavatināsau sarvasvamekasthaṃ dhārayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3398: yathā mamaiva--śītāṃśoramṛtacchaṭā yada karāḥ kasmānmano me mṛśaṃ bālapriyā gamyaṃ darśayati---pāṇḍimnetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3424: me manaḥ dhvanerātmānamupanibadhnāti sukaviḥ samāhitacetāstādā tasyātmalābho bhavati mahīyāniti /
GK16andhvc2u:3432: kiṃ prāṇānna harantyuta priyatamāsañjalpamantrākṣarai- rakṣyante kimu mohamemi hahahā no vejhi keyaṃ gatiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3435: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācyadhvaneḥ prathamaṃ bhedamalakṣyakramaṃ vicāryaṃ dvitīyaṃ bhedaṃ vibhaktumāha---krameṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3441: kālakūṭānāṃ paṭalyā samūhena yaḥ saṃvāsaḥ dvayorekotpannatvātsahavāsaḥ saṃsargaṃ iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:3443: tarhi te kiṃ kutaḥ prāṇānna haranti?
GK16andhvc2u:3447: priyatamāyāḥ sañjalpeṣu yāni mantrākṣarāṇi viṣāpahārīṇi taiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3461: kā no vejhi na jānāmītyanena punarupādānaṃ ca pratyāyyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3469: asya vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvaneḥ saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyatvādanuraṇana- prakhyo ya ātmā so 'pi śūbdaśaktimūlo 'rthaśaktimūlaśceti dviprakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3470: nanu śabdaśaktyā yatrārthāntaraṃ prakāśate sa yadi dhvaneḥ prakāra ucyate tadidānīṃ śleṣasya viṣaya evāpahṛtaḥ syāt,
GK16andhvc2u:3474: yasminn anuktaḥ śabdena śabda-śakty-udbhavo hi saḥ // DhvK_2.21 //
GK16andhvc2u:3478: yasmādalaṅkāro na vastumātraṃ yasmin kāvye śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa śabdaśaktyudabhavo dhvaniratyasmākaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3480: yathā--- yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścedvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3494: balino dānavānyo jayati tādṛgyena kāyo vapuḥ purāmṛtaharaṇakāle strītvaṃ prāpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3498: yaścāgaṃ govardhanaparvataṃ gāṃ ca bhūmiṃ pātālagatāmadhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3499: yasya ca nāma stutyamṛṣaya āhuḥ kiṃ tat?
GK16andhvc2u:3501: tasya śiroharo bālapriyā anusvānapadārthaṃvivṛṇvaṃstadbhānasya kramikatvaṃ darśayanti---ghaṇṭāyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3502: vivakṣitānyaparavācya ityasya sthāne 'avivakṣitavācya' iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3512: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3515: tadayamarthaḥ--yatra śabdaśaktyā sākṣādalaṅkārāntaraṃ vācyaṃ satpratibhāsate sa sarvaḥ śleṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3516: yatra tu śabdaśaktyā sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ vācyavyatiriktaṃ vyaṅgyamevālaṅkārāntaraṃ prakāśate sa dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3517: śabdaśaktyā sākṣādalaṅkārāntarapratibhā yathā--- tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargādeva hāriṇau /
GK16andhvc2u:3519: atra śṛṅgāravyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣādvirodhālaṅkāraśca pratibhāsata iti virodhacchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3522: sa tvāṃ mādhavo viṣṇuḥ sarvadaḥ pāyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3523: kīdṛk? andhakanāmnāṃ janānāṃ yena kṣayo nivāso dvārakāyāṃ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3524: yadi vā mausale iṣīkābhisteṣāṃ kṣayovināśo yena kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3525: dvitīyo 'rthaḥ--yena dhvastakāmena satā balijito vidhṇoḥ sambandhī kāyaḥ purā tripuranirdahanāvasare 'strīkṛtaḥ śaratvaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3526: udvṛttā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya,
GK16andhvc2u:3528: yasya ca ṝṣayaḥ śaśimaccandrayuktaṃ śira āhuḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3529: hara iti ca yasya nāma stutyamāhuḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3530: sa bhagavānsvayamevāndhakāsurasya vināśakārī tvāṃ sarvadā kalvakālamumāyā dhavo vallabhaḥ pāyādati /
GK16andhvc2u:3531: atra vastumātraṃ dvitīyaṃ pratītaṃ nālaṅkāra iti śleṣasyaiva viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3536: mādhavasyomādhavasya ca stotavyatvena prakṛtatvāttayoḥ sāmyaṃ na vivakṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3546: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya tu dhvanervācyena śleṣeṇa virodhena vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3547: yathā mamaiva-- ślādhyāśeṣatanuṃ sudarśanakaraḥ sarvāṅgalīlājata- trailokyāṃ caramāravindalalitenākrāntaloko hariḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3548: bibhrāmāṃ mukhabhindurūpamakhilaṃ candrātmacakṣurdadha- tsthāne yāṃ svatanorapaśyadadhikāṃ sā rukmiṇī vo 'vatāt //
GK16andhvc2u:3550: yathā ca--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc2u:3551: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahyaṃ kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc2u:3555: apiśabdābhāve tu na tata evārthadvayasyābhidhā syāt,
GK16andhvc2u:3558: yathā vismayaḥ śabdena pratibhāti vismaya ityanena śabdena tathā virodho 'pi pratibhātyapītyanena śabdena /
GK16andhvc2u:3586: ekatarasya tyāge grahaṇe vā yannimittaṃ tadabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3587: vācyatayaivetyasya vyatireka ityanenāpi sambandho vivakṣita ityāha---svatanoradhikāmitīti yathā vā---
GK16andhvc2u:3592: iti chāyā ) atra rūpakacchāyānugrāhī śleṣo vācyatayaivāvabhāsate /
GK16andhvc2u:3593: sa cākṣipte 'laṅkāro yatra punaḥ śabdāntareṇābhihitasvarūpasta na locanam bhujagaśabdārthaparyālocanābalādeva viṣaśabdo jalamabhidhāyāpi na virantumutsahate,
GK16andhvc2u:3597: nirāśīkṛtatvena khaṇḍitāni yāni mānasāni śatruhṛdayāni tānyeva kāñcanapaṅkajāni /
GK16andhvc2u:3601: evamākṣiptaśabdasya vyavacchedyaṃ pradarśyaivakārasya vyavacchedyaṃ darśayitumāha--sa ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:3614: prasṛtaḥ dikṣu vyāptaḥ pratāpasāro yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3615: evaṃbhūtāḥ yasya bāhuparidhāḥ gajendrā eveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3627: ubhayorarthayoḥ pratipādane abhidhāne śaktaḥ samartho yaḥ śabdaḥ tasya prayoge sati /
GK16andhvc2u:3637: yatrāpyabhidhāyā ekatra niyamahetuḥ prakaraṇādirvidyate tena dvitīyasminnarthe nābhidhā saṅkrāmati,
GK16andhvc2u:3639: tatrāpi yadi punastādṛkchabdo vidyate yenāsau niyāmakaḥ prakaraṇādiraphataśaktikaḥ sampādyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3640: ata eva sābhidhāśaktirbādhitāpi satī pratiprasūteva tatrāpi na dhvanerviṣaya iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3653: tamyā vinā ityādau camahia ityanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3664: sābhidhāśaktiḥ dvitīyārthābhidhānaśaktiḥ bādhitāpi bodhānanukūlākṛtāpi pratiprasūtā punarbodhānukūlā kṛtā /
GK16andhvc2u:3676: nanu śleṣasya śabdāntareṇa saleśādipadenābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati ityata āha--abhidhāyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3685: dṛṣṭyā keśava goparāgahṛtayā kiñcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenaiva skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
GK16andhvc2u:3686: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādgoṣṭhe harirvaściram //
GK16andhvc2u:3688: godhūlihṛtayā dṛṣṭyā na kiñciddṛṣṭaṃ mayā tena kāraṇena skhalitāsmimārge /
GK16andhvc2u:3689: tāṃ patitāṃ satīṃ māṃ kiṃ nāma kaḥ khalu heturyannalambase hastena /
GK16andhvc2u:3695: keśavagena uparāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyeti vā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3699: yataḥ sarvāsāmabalānāṃ madanavidhuramanasāmīrṣyākāluṣyanirāsena sevyamānaḥ san gatiḥ jīvitarakṣopāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3723: dhavalānyaṭṭāni yena sa cāsau hāsaśca dhavalāṭṭahāsaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3724: phullāḥ vikasitāḥ mallikāḥ phullamallikāḥ phullamallikānāṃ dhavalāṭṭahāso yatra sa iti vyadhikaraṇo bahuvrīhiriti vyācṣṭe---dhavalānītyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3725: evañjātīyakaḥ sarva eva bhavatu kāmaṃ vācyaśleṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3726: yatra tu sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ sadalaṅkārāntaraṃ śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa sarva eva dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3732: dhavalāni hṛdyānyaṭṭānyāpaṇā yena tādṛk phullamallikānāṃ hāso vikāsaḥ sitimā yatra /
GK16andhvc2u:3733: phullamallikā eva dhavalāṭṭahāso 'syeti tu vyākhyāne 'jaladabhujagajaṃ' ityetattulyametatsyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3736: ata eva 'avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasī' iti nyāyamapākurvanto mahākālaprabhṛtayaḥ śabdā etamevārthamabhidhāya kṛta kṛtyā eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3738: atra kecinmanyante---'yeti etoṣāṃ śabdānāṃ pūrvamarthāntare 'bhidhāntaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatastathāvidhe 'rthāntare bālapriyā hāsa ityasya vyakhyānaṃ--vikāsa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3750: ṛtuvarṇanarūpaḥ ṛtuvarṇanasya vā yaḥ prastāvaḥ tena niyantritāḥ tattadartheṣu niyamitāḥ abhidhāśaktayo yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3757: kṛtādiyugasamayamupasaṃharan mallikādhavalamaṭṭahāsaṃ kurvan bhayaṅkaro mahākālaḥ mahān jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣa ityādyarthabodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3761: locanam dṛṣṭatadabhidhāśaktereva pratipatturniyantritābhidhāśaktikebhya etebhyaḥ pratipattirdhvananavyāpārādeveti śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ cetyaviruddham' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3762: anye tu---'sābhidhaiva dvitīyā arthasāmarthyaṃ grīṣmasya bhīṣaṇadevatāviśeṣasādṛśyātmakaṃ sahakāritvena yato 'valamvate tato dhvananavyāpārarūpocyate' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3764: arthaśleṣe 'pi śaktibhedācchabdabheda iti darśane dvitīyaḥ śabdastatrānīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3765: sa ca kadācitabhidhāvyāpārāt yathobhayoruttaradānāya 'śvato dhāvati' iti;
GK16andhvc2u:3767: yatra tu dhvananavyāpārādeva bālapriyā arthāntare jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣādyarthe /
GK16andhvc2u:3827: tatra śabdāntarabalādapi tadarthāntaraṃ pratintaraṃ pratipannaṃ pratiyamānamūlatvātpratiyamāmeva yuktam' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3830: tadanantaraṃ tu tasya dvitīyārthasya pratipannasya prathamārthena prakāraṇikena sākaṃ yā rūpaṇā sā tāvadbhātyeva,
GK16andhvc2u:3838: bālapriyā yathā---“kāhamasmi guhā vakti praśne 'muṣmin kimuttaram /
GK16andhvc2u:3853: pratīyamānaḥ dhvananādgamyamānaḥ śabdaḥ mūlaṃ yasya tatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3883: anyathā dvatīyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena vastudhvanivyavahāro 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3891: tatra hi dvitīyārtha eva prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3892: prathamārthastu yathā vā--- dattānandāḥ prajānāṃ samucitasamayākṛṣṭasṛṣṭeḥ payobhiḥ pūrvāhṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramatyahni saṃhārabhājaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3894_2: 'yaṃ śleṣo na śabdopārūḍha iti vibhinna eva śleṣādanusvānīpamavyaṅgyasya dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3897: 'tasyāvināpi' ityatrāpiśabdena 'ślādhyā' ityatrādhikaśabdena 'bhramiṃ' ityādau ca rūpakeṇāsambaddhatā nirākṛteti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3914: kālāgarūṇā sa iva ca malīmasaḥ nīlaḥ payodharaḥ stanaḥ jaladharaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:3915: tasyāḥ kāminyāḥ prāvṛṣaścā kaṃ yuvānaṃ pathikañca /
GK16andhvc2u:3917: samucitasamaye pūrvamākṛṣṭāni paścātsṛṣṭāni taiḥ dīptāṃśoḥ sūryasya pāvanānāṃ paramutkṛṣṭaṃ vartamānāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3928_1: śīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāśca śyāmāḥ pajharāgiṇyaśca dhavaladvijaśucivadanā
GK16andhvc2u:3929: atra hi vācyo virodhastacchāyānugrāhī vā śleṣo 'yamiti na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvc2u:3931_0: yatra hi sākṣācchabdāvedito virodhālaṅkārastatra hi śliṣṭoktau vācyālaṅkārasya virodhasya
GK16andhvc2u:3940: dhvalairdvijairdantaiḥ śuci nirmalaṃ vadanaṃ yāsāṃ dhavaladvijavadutkṛṣṭavipravacchuci vadanaṃ ca yāsās /
GK16andhvc2u:3943: tatra yo virodhaḥ śleṣo veti saṅkaraḥ tasya viṣayatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:3972: yathā vā mamaiva--- sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayamadhīśamīśaṃ dhiyāṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:3974: atra hi śabdaśaktimūlānusvānarūpo virodhaḥ sphuṭameva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3976: yathā mamaiva--- khaṃ ye 'tyujjvalayanti lūnatamaso ye vā nakhodbhāsino locanam tatraiva virodhe śleṣe vā vācyālaṅkāratvaṃ suvacamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:3979: nanu mātaṅgetyādāvapi dharmadvaye yaścakāraḥ sa virodhadyotaka eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3980: anyathā pratadharmaṃ sarvadharmānte vā na kvacidvā cakāraḥ syāt yadi samuccayārthaḥ syādityabhiprāyeṇodāharaṇāntaramāha---yatheti /
GK16andhvc2u:3982: yo na dhīśaḥ sa kathaṃ dhiyāmīśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3983: yo hariḥ kapilaḥ sa kathaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3984: caturaḥ parākramayukto yasyātmā sa kathaṃ niṣkriyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3985: arīṇāmarayuktānāṃ yo nāśayitā sa kathaṃ cakraṃ vahumānena dhārayati /
GK16andhvc2u:3990: bālapriyā tathā ca virodhaśleṣasaṅkarasya vācyālaṅkṛtitvanirūpitaṃ viṣayatvamiti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3996: mātaṅgagāminyaśśīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāścetyādau dharmadvayavācakānte yaścakāra ityarthaḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4002: sarvadharmānta ityatra sarvaśabdānta iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4012: pratīyata ityasya dhvanyata ityartha ityāha--nocyate kenaciditi /
GK16andhvc2u:4014: ye mūrdhasvavabhāsinaḥ kṣitibhṛtāṃ ye cāmarāṇāṃ śirāṃ- syākrāmantyubhaye 'pi te dinapateḥ pādāḥ śriye santu vaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4018: arthaśaktyudbhavas tv anyo yatrārthaḥ sa prakāśate /

GK16andhvc2u:4023: locanam nakhairudbhāsante ye 'vaśyaṃ khe gagane na udbhāsanta /

GK16andhvc2u:4035: ye kiraṇāḥ, saroruhāṇāṃ pajhānāṃ śriyaṃ kāntiṃ puṣṇanti ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4038: kṣitibhṛtāṃ parvatānām mūrdhasuśṛṅgeṣu śirassu ca ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4039: amarāṇāṃ devānām śirāṃsi ākrāmanti praṇāmakāle spṛśanti teṣvanavabhāsinaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:4042: a6 lūnatamastvādidharmaiḥ kiraṇatulyānāṃ dinapateścaraṇānāṃ gaganānudbhāsitvādibhiḥ kiraṇebhyo vyatireko dhvanita iti bodhyam // 2.1 //
GK16andhvc2u:4045: ya uktiṃ vinā svatastātparyeṇa anyadvastu vyanaktī'tyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4060: yadi lajjātmakavyabhicāripratītistarhyayamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasyaiva dhvanerviṣayo na tu vastudhvaneriti śaṅkate--'na ce'tyādi /

GK16andhvc2u:4066: atra hi līlākamalapatrragaṇanamupasarjanīkṛtasvarūpaṃ śabdavyāpāraṃ vinaivārthāntaraṃ vyabhicāribhāvalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:4068: yato yatra sākṣācchabdaniveditebhyo vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4070_0: yathā kumārasambhave madhuprasaṅge vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantyā devyā āgamanādivarṇanaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:4077: vyabhicāraṇāṃ yatrālakṣyakramatayā vyavadhivandhyaiva pratipattiḥ svavibhāvādabalāttatra sākṣācchabdaniveditatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti na pūrvāparavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4078: pūrvaṃ hyuktaṃ vyabhicāriṇāmapi bhāvatvānna svaśabdataḥ pratipattirityādi vistarataḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4090: ityādāvityādipadena 'āvarjitā kiñcidive'tyādeḥ iha tu sāmarthyākṣiptavyabhicārimukhena rasapratītiḥ tasmādayamanyo dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4096: saṃmohanaṃ nāma ca puṣpadhanvā dhanuṣyamoghaṃ samadhatta bāṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:4100_0: atra hi bhagavatyāḥ prathamameva tatpravaṇatvāttasya cedānīṃ tadunmukhībhūtatvātpraṇayipriyatayā
GK16andhvc2u:4102: iha tu pajhadalagaṇanamadhomukhatvaṃ cānyathāpi kumārīṇāṃ sambhāvyata iti jhaṭiti na lajjāyāṃ viśramayati hṛdayaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:4121: sūcito yaḥ pakṣapātaḥ gāḍhībhāvadrasātmakasthāyirūpaḥ tasya vyabhicāriṇaśca,

GK16andhvc2u:4163: yadyapi cātra śabdāntarasannidhāne 'pa pradoṣārthaṃ prati na kasyacidabhidhāśaktiḥ padasyeti vyañjakatvaṃ na vighaṭitaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:4176: tarhi kathamatra lakṣyakramatvamuktamityata āha--lajjeti evaśabdaḥ kevalaśabdaśceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4181: viṭaṃ saṅketakāle mano yasya taṃ tajjijñāsum /
GK16andhvc2u:4182: ata eva hasadbhyāṃ netrābhyāmarpitaṃ sūcitaṃ ākūtaṃ saṅketakālajijñāsārūpābhiprāyo yena tam /
GK16andhvc2u:4202: śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā śabdārthaśaktyā vākṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaryatra svoktyā prakāśīkriyate so 'smādanusvānopamavyaṅgyāddhvaneranya evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4203: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛganyo 'laṅkāraḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4209: prakāntaprakāradvayopasaṃhāraṃ tṛtīyaprakārasūcanaṃ caikenaiva yatnena karomītyāśayena sādhāraṇamavataraṇapadaṃ prakṣipati vṛttikṛt---tathā ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4210: tena coktaprakāradvayenāyamapi tṛtīyaḥ prakāro mantavya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4221: ataḥ me kṛtyaṃ sūcitaṃ sat ko 'pi na veda na jānāti /
GK16andhvc2u:4229: na tu vyaṅgyārthaḥ śabdāntareṇa pradarśita itītyāha--ata eveti // 2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:4236: śabdaścārthaśca śabdārthau śabdārthauca śabdārthau ca śabdārthāḥ teṣāṃ śaktetyarthātrrividho 'pi bhedassaṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4245: tatra śabdaśaktyā yathā--- vatse mā gā viṣādaṃ śvasanamurujavaṃ santyajordhvapravṛttaṃ kampaḥ ko vā guruste bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitenātra yāhi /
GK16andhvc2u:4246: pratyākhyānaṃ surāṇāmiti bhayaśamanacchajhanā kārayitvā yasmai lakṣmīmadvādvaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ payodhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4247: locanam sa vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nyo vācyamātrālaṅkārāpekṣayā dvitīyo lokottaraścālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4253: jṛmbhitaṃ ca gātrasaṃmardanātmakaṃ balaṃ bhinatti āyāsakāritvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4256: sā hi kamalā puṇḍarīkākṣameva hṛdaye nidhāyotthiteti svayameva devāntarāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:4257_1: tatsamarthācaraṇamanyatra doṣodghāṭanena atra yāhīti cābhinayaviśeṣeṇa sakalaguṇādaradarśakena kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4266: he vatse tvaṃ viṣādaṃ duḥkhaṃ mā gāḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4294: arthaśaktyā yathā---- ambā śete 'tra vṛddhā pariṇatavayasāmagraṇaritra tāto niḥśeṣāgārakarmaśramaśithilatanuḥ kumbhadāsī tathātra /
GK16andhvc2u:4295: asmin pāpāhamekā katipayadivasaproṣitaprāṇanāthā pānthāyetthaṃ taruṇyā kathitamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvam //
GK16andhvc2u:4297: locanam ityuktaprakāreṇa bhayanivāraṇavyājena surāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ lakṣmīṃ kārayitvā payodhiryasmai tāmadātsa vo yuṣmākaṃ duritaṃ dahatviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4299: atraikaikasya padasya vyañjaktavaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ sukalpyamiti svakaṇṭhena noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:4304: bhagavatsambandhiṣu sakalaguṇeṣu ya ādaraḥ svasya bahumatistaddarśakenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4315: niśśeṣairagārakarmabhissvayamanuṣṭhitaiḥ gṛhakarmabhiḥ yaḥ śramastena śithilā asvasthā tanuryasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc2u:4317: avasarasya tattassthale mātrādiśayanādirūpasya prastāvasya vyāhṛtiruktiḥ tasya vyājaḥ saḥ pūrvo yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc2u:4318: atrāvayoryathākāmaṃ rantuṃ śakyaṃ ko 'pi na jānīyāt,
GK16andhvc2u:4319: tvaddarśanena kāmārtā māṃ ramaṇena prīṇayeti vaktrī bodhayatīti vaktṛvaiśiṣṭyādijñānavatāṃ sahṛdayānāṃ vyajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4320: parantu vyaṅgyārtho yamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvamiti vyājaśabdena kavinā āviṣkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4322: ambā tāta ityābhyāṃ pitrornaisargikavātsalyaśālitvena tau mama sarvatrāpyanukūlāveveti /
GK16andhvc2u:4330: katipayetyādinā patyuracirātpratyāgamanamanāśaṅkyamiti prāṇanāthaityanena pativiṣayakānurāgābhāva iti ca dyotyata ityūhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4336: artho 'pi dvividho jñeyo vastuno 'nyasya dīpakaḥ // DhvK_2.24 //
GK16andhvc2u:4340: arthaśaktyudbhavānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye dhvanau yo vyañjako 'rtha uktastasyāpi dvau prakārau---kaveḥ kavinibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ prauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīra ekaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4345: evamarthaśaktyudbhavasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam. śleṣādyalaṅkarebhyaścāsya vibhakto viṣaya uktaḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4420: svataḥ sambhavī ya aucatyena bahirapi sambhāvyamānasadbhāvo na kevalaṃ bhaṇitivaśenaivābhiniṣpannaśariraḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4470: garvaśca bālyāvivekādināpi bhavatīti nātra svoktisadbhāvaḥ śaṅkyaḥ /
