GK16andhvc2u:4918: avaraddhasya vi ṇa hu de pahujāṇaa rosiuṃ sakkam //
GK16andhvc2u:4920: aparāddhasyāpi na khalu te bahujña roṣituṃ śakyam //
GK16andhvc2u:4921: iti chāyā) locanam daivāyatte phale kiṃ kriyatāmetāvatpunarbhaṇāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4924: kiṃ kriyatāṃ pallavāstvatīva hṛdyā itīyatābhidhā samāptaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:4925: atra phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātsamarthakamasya vastunaḥ pūrvameva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4926: lokottarajigīṣātadupāyapravṛttasyāpi hi phalaṃ sampallakṣaṇaṃ daivāyattaṃ kadācinna bhavedapītyevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakam /
GK16andhvc2u:4927: nanvasya sarvavākyasyāprastutapraśaṃsā prādhānyena vyaṅgyā tatkathamarthāntaranyāsasya vyaṅgyatā,
GK16andhvc2u:4929: sarvo hi dhvaniprapañcaḥ padaprakāśo vākyaprakāśaśceti yakṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4936: atra ityevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ asya vastunaḥ samarthakaṃ phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātpūrvameva pratīyata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4937: daivāyatte hi phale kiṃ kriyatāmityatra phalaśabdaḥ prakaraṇavaśāt sasyarūpamarthamabhidhayā vakti,
GK16andhvc2u:4940: tataśca sarveṣāṃ sampado daivāyattāḥ kadācinna bhaveyurapīti sāmānyarūpo 'rthaḥ pūrvoktaprastutārthasya samarthako labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4941: pūrvameva pratīyate ityasya daivāyatte hi phale ityasya śravaṇakāla eva pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4944: upāyapravṛttasyāpi sampallakṣaṇaṃ phalamalabdhavataḥ kasyacidrājādeḥ guṇapraśaṃsārūpaḥ prastutārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4954: nanvevaṃ sati kathamatra vyavahāra hatyata atra hi vācyaviśeṣeṇa sāparāghasyāpi bahujñasya kopaḥ kartumaśakya iti samarthakaṃ sāmānyamanvitamanyattātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc2u:4958: hṛdaye sthāpito na tu bahiḥ prakaṭato manyuryayā /
GK16andhvc2u:4959: ata evāpradarśitaroṣamukhīmapi māṃ prasādayan he bahujña,
GK16andhvc2u:4960: aparāddhasyāpi tava na khalu roṣakaraṇaṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4962: anantaraṃ tu tadarthaparyālojanādyatsāmānyarūpaṃ samarthakaṃ pratīyate tadeva camatkārakāri /
GK16andhvc2u:4963: sā hi khaṇḍitā satī vaidagdhyānunītā taṃ pratyasūyāṃ darśayantītthamāha /
GK16andhvc2u:4964: yaḥ kaścidbahujño dhūrtaḥ sa evaṃ sāparādho 'pi svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayatīti mā tvamātmani bahumānaṃ mithyā grahīriti /
GK16andhvc2u:4973: kasyāścidantargataroṣāyā anāviṣkṛtaroṣacihnāyāḥ kṛtāgasā vallabhena prasādyamānāyāḥ taṃ prativacanam--hṛdayetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4980: ato 'parāddhamapi tvāṃ prati roṣaṃ kartuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5005: yato bahujñāstu sāparādhā api tattadvacanena svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5006: anvitamityanena sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvarūpasambandho vivakṣita iti darśayati---viśeṣa ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5011: jāejja vaṇuddese khujja vvia pāavo gaḍiavatto /
GK16andhvc2u:5012: mā māṇusammi loe tāekvaraso dariddo a //
GK16andhvc2u:5015: ita chāyā) atra hi tyāgaikarasasya daridrasya janmānabhinandanaṃ truṭitapatrrakubjapā dapajanmābhinandanaṃ ca sākṣācchabdavācyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5016: tathāvidhādapi pādapāttādṛśasya puṃsa upamānopameyatvapratītipūrvakaṃ śocyatāyāmādhikyaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:5024: jāyeya, vanoddeśa eva vanasyaikānte gahane yatra sphuṭatarabahuvṛkṣasampattyā prekṣate 'pi na kaścit /
GK16andhvc2u:5027: chāyāmapi na karoti tasya kā puṣpaphalavattetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5028: tādṛśo 'pi kadācidāṅgārikasyopayogī bhavedulūkādīnāṃ vā nivāsāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5032: yatra lokyate so 'rthibhistena cārthijano na ca kiñcicchakyate kartuṃ tanmahadvaiśasamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5034: ityasyānantaraṃ 'raktastvaṃnavapallavai'riti iti ca pāṭhaḥ kvacit dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc2u:5048: ahaṃ kubjaḥ galitapatraḥ pādapaḥ panoddeśe iva jāyeya /
GK16andhvc2u:5051: atra hi madhau malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākāritvaṃ manmathonmāthadāyitvenaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:5059: viṣavātena hi mūrchito bṛṃhita upacito mohaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:5060: ekaśca mūrcchitaḥ pathikamadhye 'nyeṣāmapi dhairyacyuti vidadhanmūrcchāṃ karotītityubhayathotprekṣā /
GK16andhvc2u:5062: tataḥ kiṃ? na hi hetutā paramārthataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5063: tathāpi tu hetutā utprekṣyata iti yatkiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc2u:5079: prakṛte niḥśvāsānilasya bhujagasambandhitayāviṣasamparko gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5081: tatra samucchrāyārthāprāyeṇā vyācaṣṭe---bṛṃhita iti asyaiva vivaraṇam---upacita iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5090: ubhayathotprekṣeti viṣavātopacitatvaṃ mohāvasthāprāptiśceti ye tayoḥ malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākaraṇehetutvenotprekṣetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5105: candanāsaktabhujagānāṃ niśvāsānilaiḥ mūrcchitaḥ sambaddha iti svarūpakathanamātraparaṃ tadviśeṣaṇamato vācyārthaniṣpattirbodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5110: isākalusassa vi tuha muhassa ṇaṃ esa puṇṇimācando /
GK16andhvc2u:5111: ajja sarisattaṇaṃ pāviūṇa aṅge via ṇa māi //
GK16andhvc2u:5113: adya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyāṅga eva na māti //
GK16andhvc2u:5118: yadi tu prasannasya mukhasya sādṛśyamudvahetsarvadā vā tatkiṃ kuryāttvanmukhaṃ tvetadbhavatīti manorathānāmapyapathamidamityapiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5119: aṅge svadehe na mātyeva daśa diśaḥ pūrayati yataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5122: nanu nanuśabdena vitarkotprekṣārūpamācakṣāṇenāsambaddhatā nirākṛteti sambhāvayamāna bālapriyā 'anuraṇanarūpā' saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5124: śaṅkate 'na ce'tyādi 'evaṃvidhe viṣaye' iti candanāsaktetyādisthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5144: atra gamyaṃ hetumāha---daśadiśaḥ pūrayati yata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5148: aṅgena bhātyevetyanena labdhaṃ svaprabhayā diśaṃ pūraṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5151: tava mukhasya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyeveti mukhasādṛśyaprāptihetukatvenotprekṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5159: anubaddhaḥ yathā vā---- trāsākulaḥ paripatan parito niketān puṃbhirna kaiścidapi dhanvibhiranvabandhi /
GK16andhvc2u:5160: tasthau tathāpi na mṛgaḥ kvacidaṅganābhi- rākarṇapūrṇanayaneṣuhatekṣaṇaśrīḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5162: śleṣadhvaniryathā--- ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5164: atra vadhūmiḥ saha valabhīrasevanteti vākyārthapratīteranantaraṃ vadhva iva locanam udāharaṇāntaramāha--yathā veti /
GK16andhvc2u:5165: paritaḥ sarvato niketān paripatannākramanna kaiścidapi cāpapāṇibhirasau mṛgo 'nubaddhastathāpi na kvacittasthau trāsacāpalayogātsvābhāvikādeva /
GK16andhvc2u:5166: tatra cotprekṣā dhvanyate---aṅganābhirākarṇapūrṇaurnetraśarairhatār ikṣaṇaśrīḥ sarvasvabhūtā yasya yato 'to na tasthau /
GK16andhvc2u:5171: kimākārāḥ prasiddhīḥ ramyā ityevamākārāḥ viviktā janasaṅkulatvābhāvādityato heto rāgaṃ sambhogābhilāṣaṃ vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5174: yato hetoḥ viviktā vibhaktaṅgyo laṭabhāḥ yāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5180: 'na tasthāvi'tyatra vāstavo hetustrāsākula ityanena darśita ityāha---trāsetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5181: ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ karṇaparyantavyāptaiḥ ākarṇakṛṣṭaiśca netraśaraiḥ netrāṇyeva śarāstaiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:5193: tathācoktasthale ivādiśabdābhāve 'pyutprekṣārūpārthasya sahṛdayānāṃ pratīterasambaddhatvāpādānaṃ na yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5204: api tvarthasaundaryabalādeveti sarvathā dhvanyamāna eva śleṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5205: ata eva vadhva iva valabhya ityabhidadhatāpi vṛttikṛtopamādhvaniriti noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:5207: samā iti hi yadi spaṣṭaṃ bhavettadopamāyā eva spaṣṭatvācchleṣastadākṣiptaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:5209: na ca tena vinābhidāyā aparipuṣṭatā kācit /
GK16andhvc2u:5210: ata eva samāptāyāmevābhidhāyāṃ sahṛdayaireva sa dvitīyo 'rtho 'pṛthakprayatnenaivāvagamyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5213: 'pīnaścaitro divā nāti' ityatrābhidhaivāparyavasiteti saiva svārthanirvāhāyārthāntaraṃ śabdāntaraṃ vākarṣatītyanumānasya śrutārthāpattervā bālapriyā samamiti śabdādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5230: yūnāṃ savadhūkānāṃ satāṃ valabhīsevanasyārthasya prakṛtatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5239: divābhojanamakurvataḥ kutaḥ pīnatvamityākāṅkṣāsattvena śāntākāṅkṣasya bodhasyājananāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5252: madanaviśeṣaṇībhūto yo 'ṅkuritādiśabdaḥ sañjāteṣatprādurbhāvādiḥ tadarthaḥ taṭgataṃ tadāśritam /
GK16andhvc2u:5266: yathāsaṅkhyadhvaniryathā--- aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca sahakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5267: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca hṛdi madanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5269: evamanye 'pyalaṅkārā yathoyogaṃ locanam tārkikamīmāṃsakayorna dhvaniprasaṅga ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc2u:5273: yathā ca dīpakadhvaniḥ-- mā bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madavalaḥ paraśurvā /
GK16andhvc2u:5274: vajramindrakaraviprasṛtaṃ vā svasti te 'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa //
GK16andhvc2u:5279: priyatamena sākamudyāne viharantī kācinnāyikā bhramaramevamāheti bhṛṅgasyābhidhāyāṃ bālapriyā 'aṅkurite' iti saptamyantapāṭho 'pi pūrvārdhe dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5290: atra “yaśca nimbaṃ paraśune“tyādāviva mā bhavantamanala ityatra dhākṣīdityasya,
GK16andhvc2u:5309: pratyutāmāntraṇaṃ tasyā maugdhyavijṛmbhitamiti abhidhayā tāvannāprastutapraśaṃsā samāpyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5325: bhṛṅgavṛttāntasya yadyaprastutatvaṃ bhavetadā priyatamopālambharūpārtha eva vākyasya viśrāntyā tasyābhidhayā samāpyatvaṃ bhavet,
GK16andhvc2u:5349: yaḥ gaurāṅgīkucakumbha iva bhūriḥ subhagaścābhogo yasya tasmin /
GK16andhvc2u:5350: sudhādhāmani candre kālāgaruṇā yā patrabhaṅgaracanā racitaḥ patrabhaṅga iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:5352: yadvā---racanāyā āvāsaḥ āspadatvaṃ tena ekena sārāyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5357: api tu gaurāṅgīstanābhogasthānīye candramasi kālāgurupatrrabhaṅgavicchittyāspadatvena yaḥ sāratāmutkṛṣṭatāmācaratīti tanna jānīmaḥ kimetadvastviti sasandeho 'pi dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5358_3: cāṭukaṃ kurvāṇaścandravartinī ceyaṃ kuvalayadalaśyāmalakāntirevameva karotīti prativastūpamādhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5359: sudhādhāmanīti candraparyāyatayopāttamapi padaṃ santāpaṃ vininīṣurityatra hetutāmapi bālapriyā eṣa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5362: tena dīpitāni yāni utkānāmutkaṇṭhitānāṃ vanitānāṃ cetāṃsi tadadhivāsena udbhavo yasya tam /
GK16andhvc2u:5386: sāraḥ utkṛṣṭa ivācarati sāro bhavati iti vā vigrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5409: śobhābhiḥ saha uddīpayati iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5411: tvadīyakucaśobhā mṛgāṅkaśobhā ca saha madanamuddīpayata iti sahoktidhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5415: yataḥ--- helāpi kasyacidacintyaphalaprasūtyai kasyāpi nālamaṇave 'pi phalāya yatnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5416: digdantiromacalanaṃ dharaṇīṃ dhunoti khātsampatannapi latāṃ calayenna bhṛṅgaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5417: eṣāṃ tu bhedānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭitva saṅkaratvaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ cintyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5418: atiśayoktidhvaniryathā mamaiva--- kelīkandalitasya vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapuste dṛśau bhaṅgībhaṅgarakāmakārbhukamidaṃ bhrūnarmakarmakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5419: āpāte 'pi vikārakāraṇamaho vaktrāmbujanmāsavaḥ satyaṃ sundari vedhasastrijagatīsārastvamekākṛtiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5420: atra hi madhu māsamadanāsavānāṃ trailokye subhagatānyonyaṃ paripoṣakatvena /
GK16andhvc2u:5431: he sundari / te tava dṛśau kelīvilāsijanasya krīḍā tasyāḥ kandalaṃ navāṅkuraḥ riṣadāvirbhāva iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5434: vibhramaḥ strīṇāṃ śṛhgāraceṣṭā tatkārī vibhramaḥ śobhā,
GK16andhvc2u:5435: tacchālī vā yo madhurvasantaḥ tasya dhuraṃ kāmoddīpanādibhāraṃ vahatīti dhuryam /
GK16andhvc2u:5437: tvadīyaṃ netradvitayamacirāvirbhūtasya vasantasya kāmoddīpanādikāryakāri śarīraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5442: yadvā---bhaṅgīyuktaṃ vakraṃ ca yat kāmasya kārbhukaṃ kramikakarmaviśiṣṭaṃ dhanuḥ tadbhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5445: tathā te vaktrāmbujanmani mukhapajhe ya āsavaḥ madyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5450: ataḥ tvamekā vedhasaḥ kṛtiḥ sṛṣṭiḥ trijagatīsāraḥ trailokyasārabhūtā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5459: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // DhvK_2.28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5462: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // 28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5463: dhvanyaṅgatā cobhābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ vyañjakatvena vyaṅgyatvena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:5465: vyaṅgyatve 'pyalaṅkārāṇāṃ pradhānyavivakṣāyāmeva locanam tvayi lokottareṇa vapuṣā sambhūya sthitā ityatiśayoktirdhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5466: āpāte 'pi vikārakāraṇamityāsvādaparamparākriyayāpi vinā vikārātmanaḥ phalasya sampattiriti vibhāvanādhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5472: nanuktāstāvaccirantanairalaṅkārāsteṣāṃ tu bhavatā yadi vyaṅgyatvaṃ pradarśitaṃ kimiyatetyāśaṅkyāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5473: yeṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ vācyatvena śarīrīkaraṇaṃ śarīrabhūtātprastutādarthāntarabhūtatayā aśarīrāṇāṃ kaṭakādisthānīyānāṃ śarīratāpādanaṃ vyavasthitaṃ bālapriyā te madhumadanāsavāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5476: madanadhanuṣo bhrūrūpeṇa sthityā madanasya sthitiḥ sidhyatīti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5483: dṛgdvayasya madhośca sāmyavivakṣayā dṛśau vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapurityuktyā “nyūnasyāpi viśiṣṭene“tyādinā bhāmahādilakṣitā tulyayogitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5489: niyataḥ niyamitaḥ viṣayaḥ alaṅkāraviśeṣarūpāśrayo yasya tatkṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5513: locanam yadi vā vācyatve sati yeṣāṃ śarīratāpādanamapi na vyavasthitaṃ durghaṭamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5514: te 'laṅkārā dhvanervyāpārasya kāvyasya vāṅgatāṃ vyaṅgyarūpatayā gatāḥ santaḥ parāṃ durlabhāṃ chāyāṃ kāntimātmarūpatāṃ yānti /
GK16andhvc2u:5518: evambhūtā ceyaṃ vyaṅgyatā yā apradhānabhūtāpi vācyamātrālaṅkārebhya utkarṣamalaṅkārāṇāṃ vitarati /
GK16andhvc2u:5576: tadaprādhānye tu vācyālaṅkāra eva pradhānamiti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyateti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5577: nanvalaṅkāro vastunā vyajyate alaṅkārāntareṇa ca vyajyata ityatrodāharaṇāni kimiti na darśitānītyāśaṅkyāha---vastviti /
GK16andhvc2u:5603: vā prakāśane cārutvotkarṣanibandhane sati prādhānye 'rthaśaktudbhavānuraṇarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniravagantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5604: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādya tadābhāsavivekaṃ kartumucyate--
GK16andhvc2u:5607: vācyasyāṅgatayā vāpi nāsyāsau gocaro dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.31 //
GK16andhvc2u:5612: tatra ya eva sphuṭaḥ śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā vā prakāśate sa eva dhvanermārgo netaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5615: kamalāarā ṇaṃ maliā haṃsā uḍḍāviā ṇa a piucchā /
GK16andhvc2u:5616: locanam vyañjakasya ca pratyekaṃ vastvalaṅkārarūpatayā dviprakāratvāccaturvidho 'yamathaśaktyudbhava iti tātparyam //29// ,30 //
GK16andhvc2u:5625: te ca pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoruktabhedanayena caturdheti dvādaśavidho 'rthaśaktimūlaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5627: te ca padavākyaprakāśatvena pratyekaṃ dvividhā vakṣyante /
GK16andhvc2u:5630: bālapriyā subodhāyoktān vakṣyamāṇāṃśca dhvaniprabhedān saṅkalayyāha---avivakṣitavācyaityādinā pañjatriṃśadbhedā ityantena /
GK16andhvc2u:5638: atra padavākyaprakāśatvena bhedasyoktatvādanena varṇasaṅghaṭanāprabandhaprakāśayatvena yadbhedatrayaṃ tadeva vivakṣitaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:5645: keṇa vi gāmataḍāe abbhaṃ uttāṇaaṃ phaliham //
GK16andhvc2u:5646: atra hi pratiyamānasya mugdhavadhvā jaladharapratibimbadarśanasya vācyāṅgatvameva /
GK16andhvc2u:5647: evaṃvidhe viṣaye 'nyatrāpi yatra vyaṅgyāpekṣayā vācyasya cārutvotkarṣapratītyā prādhānyamavasīyate,
GK16andhvc2u:5653: evaṃvidho hi viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyodāharaṇatvena nirdakṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5654: locanam asyetyātmabhūtasya dhvanerasau kāvyaviśeṣo na gocaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5655: kamalākarā na malitā haṃsā uḍḍāyitā na ca sahasā /
GK16andhvc2u:5659: anye tu pi ucchā pitṛṣvasaḥ itthamāmantryate /
GK16andhvc2u:5662: vācyenaiva hi vismayavibhāvarūpeṇa mugdhimātiśayaḥ pratīyata iti vācyādeva cārutvasampat /
GK16andhvc2u:5673: kasyāścinmugdhāyāstaṭāke pratibimbitamabhraṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāyāḥ sakhījanaṃ pitṛṣvasāraṃ vā prati kamaletyādivacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:5674: kenāpi grāmataṭāke abhraṃ medhamaṇḍalam uttānitamuttānaṃ kṛtaṃ sat anyathā yathopari tathā jalāntardarśanaṃ na bhavet kṣiptaṃ parantu /
GK16andhvc2u:5675: kamalākarāḥ na malināḥ sañjātamalāḥ malinā iti vā chāyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5678: sahasetyasya sthāne pitṛṣvasa iti chāyāṃ kecit paṭhantītyāha---anya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5688: yatra tu prakaraṇādipratipattyā nirdhārataviśeṣo vācyo 'rthaḥ punaḥ pratīyamānāṅgatvenaivāvabhāsate so 'syaivānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya dhvanermārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5690: ucciṇasu paḍia kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ haliasuhṇe /
GK16andhvc2u:5691: aha de visamavirāvo samureṇa suo valaasaddo //
GK16andhvc2u:5695: aṅgānītyekamapi na tādṛgaṅgaṃ yadgāmbhīryāvahitthavaśena saṃvarītuṃ pāritam,
GK16andhvc2u:5696: sadintītyāstāṃ gṛhakarmasampādanaṃ svātmānamapi dhartuṃ na prabhavantīti /
GK16andhvc2u:5701: punarvācyaḥ punarapi svaśabdenokto 'ta eva svātmāvagateḥ sampannapūrvatvādena tāvanmātraparyavasāyī na bhavati bālapriyā datteti /
GK16andhvc2u:5702: dattasaṅketo yaścauryakāmuko jāraḥ tasya ratasamucitasthāne vetasalatāgahane prāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5713: gṛhakarmayoge sphuṭaṃ tathā na lakṣyamāṇānīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5727: vākyajanyabodhaṃ pratyeva prakaraṇādijñānasya hetutvāt upalakṣaṇaṃ cedamanumānādajanyaniścayasya /
GK16andhvc2u:5728: 'uccinvi'tyādau śephālikādhūnanaṃ na kartavyaṃ śvaśurakopādyaniṣṭajanakatvāditi vacanādijanyo bodhayitavyanāyikādigato niścayo grāhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5731_0: ata atra hyavinayapatinā saha ramamāṇā sakhī bahiḥśrutavalayakalakalayā locanam tathāvidhaśca
GK16andhvc2u:5731_2: sphuṭaṃ vadatā vyaṅgyaguṇībhāve tvetadviparītameva nibandhanaṃ mantavyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5732: uccinu patitaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śephālikāṃ hālakasnuṣe /
GK16andhvc2u:5733: eṣa te viṣamavipākaḥ śvaśureṇa śruto valayaśabdaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5735: yataḥ śvaśuraḥ śophālikālatikāṃ prayatnai rakṣaṃstasyā ākarṣaṇadhūnanādinā kupyati /
GK16andhvc2u:5738: atra ca 'kassa vā ṇa hoi roso' ityetadanusāreṇa vyākhyā kartavyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5741: svatassiddhatayā avacanīya eva so 'rthaḥ syāditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5742: nanvevaṃ vyaṅgyasyopaskāratā pratyutoktā bālapriyā evetyasya vivaraṇam---svāmetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5756: śvaśureṇa śrutaḥ san viṣamavipākaḥ viṣamo 'niṣṭajanako vipākaḥ pariṇāmo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5761: atra yatkiñcidvyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatve 'pi vyaṅgyāntaramādāya dhvanitvamiti darśayati vṛttau--'atre'tyādinā /
GK16andhvc2u:5775: sahṛdayānāṃ tu ramamāṇanāyikāyai sakhī pratibodhayatīti ca jñānaṃ jñāyamānaṃ tadyvaṅgyaṃ vā vācyārthalābhaṃ prati sahakārīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5786: punarvācya iti grantho yathāvyākhyātastathā sakhyā pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5789: evaṃ vivakṣitavācyasya dhvanestadābhāsaviveke prastute satyavivakṣitavācyasyāpi taṃ kartumāha---
GK16andhvc2u:5791: avyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ skhalad-gateḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5792: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhir viṣayo dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5795: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhirviṣayo dhvaneḥ // 32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5808: yathā---- preṅkhatpremaprabandhapracuraparicaye prauḍhasīmantinīnāṃ cittākāśāvakāśe viharati satataṃ yaḥ sa saubhāgyabhūmiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5810: cittākāśa iti gauṇaḥ prayogaḥ kavinā kṛto 'pi na dhvanyamānarūpasundaraprayojanāṃśaparyavasāyī /
GK16andhvc2u:5823: prastute ityasya ārabdhe prakṛte iti vā vyākhyāne sati tatpadamasaṅgataṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5829: premṇaḥ prabandhaḥ prakarṣeṇa bandhaḥ sthirīkaraṇaṃ tena saha pracuraḥ paricayo yasya tasmin /
GK16andhvc2u:5835: skhaladgaterupacaritasya śabdasyāvyutpatteraśaktervā nibandho yaḥ sa ca na dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5839: yad vyaṅgyasyāṅgi-bhūtasya tat pūrṇaṃ dhvani-lakṣaṇam // DhvK_2.33 //
GK16andhvc2u:5843: locanam yathā---- viṣamakāṇḍakuṭumbakasañcayapravara vārinidhau patatā tvayā /
GK16andhvc2u:5851: prathamoddyote yaḥ prasiddhyanurodhapravartitavyavahārāḥ kavaya ityatra 'vadati bisinīpatrraśayanam' ityādi bhākta uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5852: sa na kevalaṃ dhvanerna viṣayo yāvadayamanyo 'pīti caśabdasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5853: uktameva dhvanisvarūpaṃ tadābhāsavivekahetutayā kārikākāro 'nuvadatītyabhiprāyeṇa vṛttikṛdupaskāraṃ dadāti--yata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5861: viṣamaḥ viṣamasaṃkhyākaḥ kāṇḍaśśaro yasya tasya kāmadevasya,
GK16andhvc2u:5862: yaḥ kuḍumbakasañjayaḥ tasya pravaramukhya he candretyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5864: kuraṅgeti pāṭhe ca latākuraṅgeṇa mṛgeṇa vidhūrṇitaṃ bhājanaṃ madhyabhāgo yasya tasminnityātmaviśeṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:5872: sa ceti cakāraḥ prathamodyotoktasamuccāyaka ityāha--prathamadyoto ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5878: avabhāsanapadena avabhāsamānaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5890: vṛttāvevakāreṇa tato 'nyasya cābhāsarūpatvameveti sūcayatā tadābhāsavivekahetubhāvoyaḥ prakrantaḥ sa eva nirvāhita iti śivam //
GK16andhvc2u:5893: iti śrīmahāmāheśvarācāryavaryābhinavaguptonmīlite sahṛdayāloka locane dhvanisaṅkete dvitīya uddyotaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5900: yayā māyārūpayā parameśvaryā prājyaṃ prabhūtam idaṃ jagadati prathamāntatayā /
GK16andhvc2u:5902: prollāsaḥ pratītistanmātram sat na tu vastusaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5906: idaṃ jagatpaśyantīṃ tāmabhinavagupto 'haṃ vande iti sambandhaḥ /
